original: brahmāsya jagato nimittakāraṇaṃ prakṛtiścetyasya pakṣasyākṣepaḥ smṛtinimittaḥ parihṛtaḥ /

original: nanu dharma iva brahmaṇyanapekṣa āgamo bhavitumarhati /

original: bhavedayamavaṣṭambho yadi pramāṇāntarānavagāhya āgamamātraprameyo 'yamarthaḥ syādanuṣṭheyarūpa iva dharmaḥ /
analyzed: bhavet ayam avaṣṭambhaḥ yadi pramāṇa antarān avagāhyaḥ āgama mātra prameyaḥ yam arthaḥ syāt anuṣṭheya rūpaḥ iva dharmaḥ
pariniṣpanna rūpam tu brahma avagamyate

original: pariniṣpanne ca vastuni pramāṇāntarāṇāmastyavakāśo yathā pṛthivyādiṣu /
analyzed: pariniṣpanne ca vastuni pramāṇa antarāṇām asti avakāśaḥ yathā pṛthivī ādiṣu

original: anubhavāvasānaṃ ca brahmavijñānamavidyāyā nivartakaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ ca dṛṣṭaphalatayeṣyate /
analyzed: anubhava avasānam ca brahma vijñānam avidyāyāḥ nivartakam mokṣa sādhanam ca dṛṣṭa phala tayā iṣyate

original: śrutirapi- 'śrotavyo mantavyaḥ' iti śravaṇavyatirekeṇa mananaṃ vidadhatī tarkamapyatrādartavyaṃ darśayati /

original: yaduktaṃ cetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiriti /

tat na upapadyate

original: idaṃ hi brahmakāryatvenābhipreyamāṇaṃ jagat brahmavilakṣaṇamacetanamaśuddhaṃ ca dṛśyate /

original: brahma ca jagadvilakṣaṇaṃ cetanaṃ śuddhaṃ ca śrūyate /

original: nahi rucakādayo vikārā mṛtprakṛtikā bhavanti śarāvādayo vā suvarṇaprakṛtikāḥ /

original: mṛdaiva tu mṛdānvitā vikārāḥ kriyante suvarṇena ca suvarṇānvitāḥ /
analyzed: mṛdā eva tu mṛdā anvitāḥ vikārāḥ kriyante suvarṇena ca suvarṇa anvitāḥ

original: tathedamapi jagadacetanaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānvitaṃ sadacetanasyaiva sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasya kāraṇasya kāryaṃ bhavitumarhatīti na vilakṣaṇasya
analyzed: tathā idam api jagat acetanam sukha duḥkha moha anvitam sat acetanasya eva sukha duḥkha moha ātmakasya kāraṇasya kāryam bhavitum arhati iti na vilakṣaṇasya
brahma vilakṣaṇam ca asya jagataḥ śuddhi acetana tva darśanāt avagantavyam
aśuddham hi jagat sukha duḥkha moha ātmaka tayā prīti paritāpa viṣāda ādi hetu tvāt svarga naraka ādi uccāvaca prapañca tvāt ca
acetanam ca idam jagat cetanam prati kārya kāraṇa bhāvena upakaraṇa bhāva upagamāt
nahi sāmye sati upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ bhavati
nahi pradīpau parasparasya upakurutaḥ

original: nanu cetanamapi kāryakāraṇaṃ svāmibhṛtyanyāyena bhokturupakariṣyati / na /
analyzed: nanu cetanam api kārya kāraṇam svāmi bhṛtya nyāyena bhoktuḥ upakariṣyati na
svāmi bhṛtyayoḥ api acetana aṃśasya eva cetanam pratyupakāraka tvāt

original: yo hyekasya cetanasya parigraho buddhyādicetanabhāgaḥ sa evānyasya cetanasyopakaroti natu svayameva cetanaścetanāntarasyopakarotyapakaroti
analyzed: yaḥ hi ekasya cetanasya parigrahaḥ buddhi ādi cetana bhāgaḥ saḥ eva anyasya cetanasya upakaroti na tu svayam eva cetanaḥ cetanā antarasya upakaroti apakaroti
niratiśayāḥ hi akartāraḥ cetanāḥ iti sāṃkhyāḥ manyante
tasmāt acetanam kārya kāraṇam
na ca kāṣṭa loṣṭa ādīnām cetana tve kim cit pramāṇam asti
prasiddhaḥ ca ayam cetana acetana vibhāgaḥ loke
tasmāt brahma vilakṣaṇa tvāt na idam jagat tad prakṛtikam

original: yo 'pi kaścidācakṣīta śrutvā jagataścetanaprakṛtikatāṃ tadbalenaiva samastaṃ jagaccetanamavagamayiṣyāmi /

avibhāvanam tu caitanyasya pariṇāma viśeṣāt bhaviṣyati

original: yathā spaṣṭacaitanyānāmapyātmanāṃ svāpamūrcchādyavasthāsu caitanyaṃ na vibhāvyata evaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādīnāmapi caitanyaṃ na vibhāvayiṣyate /
analyzed: yathā spaṣṭa caitanyānām api ātmanām svāpa mūrcchā ādi avasthāsu caitanyam na vibhāvyate evam kāṣṭha loṣṭa ādīnām api caitanyam na vibhāvayiṣyate

original: etasmādeva ca vibhāvitāvibhāvitatvakṛtādviśeṣādrūpādibhāvābhāvābhyāṃ ca kāryakāraṇānāmātmanāṃ ca cetanatvāviśeṣe 'pi guṇapradhānabhāvo na virotsyate
analyzed: etasmāt eva ca vibhāvita a vibhāvita tva kṛtāt viśeṣāt rūpa ādi bhāva abhāvābhyām ca kārya kāraṇānām ātmanām ca cetana tva aviśeṣe guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ na virotsyate

original: yathā ca pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pi māṃsasūpaudanādīnāṃ pratyātmavartino viśeṣātparasparopakāritvaṃ bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /

original: 'tatteja aikṣata' ityapi parasyā eva devatāyā adhiṣṭātryāḥ svavikāreṣvanugatāyā iyamīkṣā vyapadiśyata iti draṣṭavyam /

ahaṃśreyase sva sva śreṣṭha tvāya
niḥśreyasam śraiṣṭhyam
dṛśyate tu
tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati
yat uktam vilakṣaṇa tvāt na idam jagat brahma prakṛtikam iti
na ayam ekāntaḥ

original: dṛśyate hi loke cetanatvena prasiddhebhyaḥ puruṣādibhyo vilakṣaṇānāṃ keśanakhādīnāmutpattiḥ,
analyzed: dṛśyate hi loke cetana tvena prasiddhebhyaḥ puruṣa ādibhyaḥ vilakṣaṇānām keśa nakha ādīnām utpattiḥ
acetana tvena ca prasiddhebhyaḥ gomaya ādibhyaḥ vṛścika ādīnām
nanu acetanāni eva puruṣa ādi śarīrāṇi acetanānām keśa nakha ādīnām kāraṇāni
acetanāni eva ca vṛścika ādi śarīrāṇi acetanānām gomaya ādīnām kāryāṇi iti

original: ucyate- evamapi kiñcidacetanaṃ cetanasyāyatanabhāvamupagacchati kiñcinnetyastyeva vailakṣaṇyam /
analyzed: ucyate evam api kiñcid acetanam cetanasya āyatana bhāvam upagacchati kiñcid na iti asti eva vailakṣaṇyam

original: mahāṃścāyaṃ pāriṇāmikaḥ svabhāvaviprakarṣaḥ puruṣādīnāṃ keśanakhādīnāṃ ca svarūpādibhedāt /
analyzed: mahān ca ayam pāriṇāmikaḥ svabhāva viprakarṣaḥ puruṣa ādīnām keśa nakha ādīnām ca svarūpa ādi bhedāt
tathā gomaya ādīnām vṛścika ādīnām ca
atyanta sārūpye ca prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ eva pralīyeta

original: athocyetāsti kaścitpārthivatvādisvabhāvaḥ puruṣādīnāṃ keśanakhādiṣvanuvartamāno gomayādīnāṃ vṛścikādiṣviti /
analyzed: atha ucyeta asti kaścid pārthiva tva ādi svabhāvaḥ puruṣa ādīnām keśa nakha ādiṣu anuvartamānaḥ gomaya ādīnām vṛścika ādiṣu iti
brahmaṇaḥ pi tarhi sattā lakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ ākāśa ādiṣu anuvartamānaḥ dṛśyate

original: vilakṣaṇatvena ca kāraṇena brahmaprakṛtitvaṃ jagato dūṣayatā kimaśeṣasya brahmasvabhāvasyānanuvartanaṃ vilakṣaṇatvamabhipreyata uta yasya kasyacidasya  #
analyzed: vilakṣaṇa tvena ca kāraṇena brahma prakṛti tvam jagataḥ dūṣayatā kim aśeṣasya brahma svabhāvasya ananuvartanam vilakṣaṇa tvam abhipreyate uta yasya kasyacid asya
caitanyasya iti vaktavyam
prathame vikalpe samasta prakṛti vikāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ
na hi asati atiśaye prakṛti vikāraḥ iti bhavati
dvitīye ca asiddha tvam

original: dṛśyate hi sattālakṣaṇo brahmasvabhāva ākāśādiṣvanuvartamāna ityuktam /
analyzed: dṛśyate hi sattā lakṣaṇaḥ brahma svabhāvaḥ ākāśa ādiṣu anuvartamānaḥ iti uktam
tṛtīye tu dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ

original: kiṃ hi yaccaitanyenānanvitaṃ tadabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ dṛṣṭamiti brahmavādinaṃ pratyudāhriyeta /
analyzed: kim hi yat caitanyena ananvitam tat abrahma prakṛtikam dṛṣṭam iti brahma vādinam pratyudāhriyeta
samastasya vastu jāyasya brahma prakṛti tva abhyupagamāt
āgama virodhaḥ tu prasiddhaḥ eva
cetanam brahma jagataḥ kāraṇam prakṛtiḥ ca iti āgama tātparyasya prasādhita tvāt
yat tu uktam pariniṣpanna tvāt brahmaṇi pramāṇa antarāṇi saṃbhaveyuḥ iti
tat api manoratha mātram
rūpa ādi abhāvāt hi na ayam arthaḥ pratyakṣasya gocaraḥ
liṅga ādi abhāvāt ca na anumāna ādīnām
āgama mātra samadhigamyaḥ eva tu ayam arthaḥ dharma vat

original: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'naiṣā tarkeṇa matirāpaneyā proktānyenaiva sujñānāya preṣṭha' (kā. 1.2.9) iti /
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ na eṣā tarkeṇa matiḥ āpaneyā proktā anyena eva su jñānāya preṣṭha kā iti
kaḥ addhā veda kaḥ iha pravocat
iyam visṛṣṭiḥ yatas ābabhūva ṛsam

original: iti caite ṛcau siddhānāmapīśvarāṇāṃ durbodhatāṃ jagatkāraṇasya darśayataḥ /
analyzed: iti ca ete ṛcau siddhānām api īśvarāṇām durbodhatām jagat kāraṇasya darśayataḥ

original: smṛtirapi bhavati- 'acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa yojayet' iti /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ api bhavati acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvāḥ na tān tarkeṇa yojayet iti
avyaktaḥ yama cintyaḥ yama vikāryaḥ yam ucyate iti ca

original: 'na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ /
analyzed: na me viduḥ sura gaṇāḥ prabhavam na mahā ṛṣayaḥ
aham ādiḥ hi devānām mahā ṛṣīṇām ca sarvaśas
iti ca evañjātīyakā

original: yadapi śravaṇavyatirekeṇa mananaṃ vidadhacchabda eva tarkamapyādartavyaṃ darśayatītyuktam /
analyzed: yat api śravaṇa vyatirekeṇa mananam vidadhat śabdaḥ eva tarkam api ādartavyam darśayati iti uktam
na anena miṣeṇa śuṣka tarkasya atra ātmalābhaḥ saṃbhavati

original: yadyapi kvacidviṣaye tarkasya pratiṣṭhitatvamupalakṣyate tathāpi prakṛte tāvadviṣaye prasajyata evāpratiṣṭhitatvadoṣādanirmokṣastarkasya /

nahi idam ati gambhīram bhāva yāthātmyam mukti nibandhanam āgamam antareṇa utprekṣitum api śakyam

eka rūpeṇa hi avasthitaḥ yaḥ ṛthaḥ sa paramārthaḥ

original: loke tadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānamityucyate yathāgniruṣṇā iti /

original: 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati
iti ca bheda dṛṣṭim apavadan eva etat darśayati

samyak jñana apanodyasya kasyacid mithyājñānasya saṃsāra kāraṇa tvena anabhyupagamāt
ubhaya satyatāyām hi katham ekatva vijñānena nānātva jñānam apanudyate iti ucyate
nanu ekatva ekānta abhyupagame nānātva abhāvat pratyakṣa ādīni laukikāni pramāṇāni vyāhanyeran nirviṣaya tvāt

mokṣa śāstrasya api śiṣya śāsitṛ ādi bheda apekṣa tvāt tad abhāve vyāghātaḥ syāt
katham ca anṛtena mokṣa śāstreṇa pratipāditasya ātma ekatvasya satya tvam upapadyeta iti
atrā ucyate na eṣa doṣaḥ
sarva vyavahārāṇām eva prāk brahma ātmatā vijñānāt satya tva upapatteḥ
svapna vyavahārasya iva prāk prabodhāt
yāvat hi na satya ātma ekatva pratipattiḥ tāvat pramāṇa prameya phala lakṣaṇeṣu vikāreṣu anṛta tva buddhiḥ na kasyacid utpadyate

original: vikārāneva tvahaṃ mametyavidyāyāmātmīyena bhāvena sarvo jantuḥ pratipadyate svābhāvikīṃ brahmātmatāṃ hitvā /
analyzed: vikārān eva tu aham mama iti avidyāyām ātmīyena bhāvena sarvaḥ jantuḥ pratipadyate svābhāvikīm brahma ātmatām hitvā
tasmāt prāk brahma ātmatā pratibodhāt upapannaḥ sarvaḥ laukikaḥ vaidikaḥ ca vyavahāraḥ

original: yathā suptasya prākṛtasya janasya svapna uccāvacānbhāvānpaśyato niścitameva pratyakṣābhimataṃ vijñānaṃ bhavati prākprabodhāt,
analyzed: yathā suptasya prākṛtasya janasya svapne uccāvacān bhāvān paśyataḥ niścitam eva pratyakṣa abhimatam vijñānam bhavati prāk prabodhāt
na ca pratyakṣa ābhāsa abhiprāyaḥ tad kāle bhavati tadvat

original: kathaṃ tvasatyena vedāntavākyena satyasya brahmātmatvasya pratipattirupapadyeta /
analyzed: katham tu asatyena vedānta vākyena satyasya brahma ātmatvasya pratipattiḥ upapadyeta
nahi rajju sarpeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ mriyate
na api mṛgatṛṣṇikā ambhasā pāna avagāhana ādi prayojanam kriyate iti
na eṣa doṣaḥ
śaṅkā viṣa ādi nimitta maraṇa ādi kārya upalabdheḥ
svapna darśana avasthasya ca sarpa daṃśana udaka snāna ādi kārya darśanāt
tad kāryam api anṛtam eva iti ced brūyāt

original: tatra brūmaḥ- yadyapi svapnadarśanāvasthasya sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryamanṛtaṃ tathāpi tadavagatiḥ satyameva phalaṃ,
analyzed: tatra brūmaḥ yadi api svapna darśana avasthasya sarpa daṃśana udaka snāna ādi kāryam anṛtam tathā api tad avagatiḥ satyam eva phalam
pratibuddhasya api a bādhyamāna tvāt

original: nahi svapnādutthitaḥ svapnadṛṣṭaṃ sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryaṃ mithyeti manyamānastadavagatimapi mithyeti manyate kaścit /
analyzed: nahi svapnāt utthitaḥ svapna dṛṣṭam sarpa daṃśana udaka snāna ādi kāryam mithyā iti manyamānaḥ tad avagatim api mithyā iti manyate kaścid
etena svapna dṛśaḥ vagati a bādhanena deha mātra ātma vādaḥ dūṣitaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyam svapneṣu paśyati

original: ityasatyena svapnadarśanena satyāyāḥ samṛddheḥ pratipattiṃ darśayati /
analyzed: iti asatyena svapna darśanena satyāyāḥ samṛddheḥ pratipattim darśayati

original: tathā pratyakṣadarśaneṣu keṣucidariṣṭeṣu jāteṣu 'na ciramiva jīviṣyatīti vidyāt'
analyzed: tathā pratyakṣa darśaneṣu keṣucid ariṣṭeṣu jāteṣu na ciram iva jīviṣyati iti vidyāt

original: ityuktvā 'atha svapnāḥ puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti' ityādinā
analyzed: iti uktvā atha svapnāḥ puruṣam kṛṣṇam kṛṣṇa dantam paśyati saḥ enam hanti ityādinā

original: tena tenāsatyenaiva svapnadarśanena satyaṃ maraṇaṃ sūcyata iti darśayati /

original: prasiddhaṃ cedaṃ loke 'nvayavyatirekakuśalānāmīdṛśena svapnadarśanena sādhvāgamaḥ sūcyata īdṛśenāsādhvāgama iti /
analyzed: prasiddham ca idam loke nvaya vyatireka kuśalānām īdṛśena svapna darśanena sādhu āgamaḥ sūcyate īdṛśena asādhu āgamaḥ iti

original: apicāntyamidaṃ pramāṇamātmaikatvasya pratipādakaṃ nātaḥ paraṃ kiñcidākāṅkṣyamasti /

original: yathāhi loke yajetetyukte kiṃ kena kathamityākāṅkṣyate naivaṃ 'tattvamasi' 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi' ityukte kiñcidanyadākāṅkṣyamasti,
analyzed: yathā hi loke yajeta iti ukte kim kena katham iti ākāṅkṣyate na evam tat tvam asi aham brahma asmi iti ukte kiñcid anyat ākāṅkṣyam asti

tat ha asya vijajñau chā

nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi chā

original: tadyathā satyāṃ mṛdi ghaṭa upalabhyate satsu ca tantuṣu paṭaḥ /

sati api nimitta naimittika bhāve
nanu anyasya bhāve pi anyasya upalabdhiḥ niyatā dṛśyate

na iti ucyate
uddhāpite pi agnau gopāla ghuṭikā ādi dhāritasya dhūmasya dṛśyamāna tvāt

original: atha dhūmaṃ kayācidavasthayā viśiṃṣyādīdṛśo dhūmo nāsatyāgnau bhavatīti /

original: naivamapi kaściddoṣaḥ tadbhāvānuraktāṃ hi buddhiṃ kāryakāraṇayorananyatve hetuṃ vayaṃ vadāmaḥ /

bhavati hi pratyakṣa upalabdhiḥ kārya kāraṇayoḥ ananya tve
tat yathā

original: tantusaṃsthāne paṭe tantuvyatirekeṇa paṭo nāma kāryaṃ naivopalabhyate kevalāstu tantava ātānavitānavantaḥ pratyakṣamupalabhyante,
analyzed: tantu saṃsthāne paṭe tantu vyatirekeṇa paṭaḥ nāma kāryam na eva upalabhyate kevalāḥ tu tantavaḥ ātāna vitānavantaḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyante
tathā tantuṣu aṃśavaḥ oṃśuṣu tad avayavāḥ

original: anayā pratyakṣopalabdhyā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāni trīṇi tato rūpāṇi vāyumātramākāśamātraṃ cetyanumeyam /

sa tvāt ca aparasya  /
itas ca kāraṇāt kāryasya ananya tvam

original: yatkāraṇaṃ prāgutpatteḥ kāraṇātmanaiva kāraṇe sattvamavarakālīnasya kāryasya śrūyate /

ātmā vai idam ekaḥ eva agre āsīt
ityādau idam śabda gṛhītasya kāryasya kāraṇena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt

original: yacca yadātmanā yatra na vartate na tattata utpadyate,
analyzed: yat ca yad ātmanā yatra na vartate na tat tatas utpadyate
yathā sikatābhyaḥ tailam
tasmāt prāk utpatteḥ ananya tvāt utpannam api ananyat eva kāraṇāt kāryam iti avagamyate

original: yathāca kāraṇaṃ brahma triṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicaratyevaṃ kāryamapi jagattriṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicarati /
analyzed: yathā ca kāraṇam brahma triṣu kāleṣu sattvam na vyabhicarati evam kāryam api jagat triṣu kāleṣu sattvam na vyabhicarati
ekam ca punar sattvam atas pi ananyatvam kāraṇāt kāryasya

original: asadvyapadeśān neti cen na dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt / BBs_2,1.17 /
analyzed: asat vyapadeśāt na iti ced na dharma antareṇa vākyaśeṣāt

original: nanu kvacidasattvamapi prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya vyapadiśati śrutiḥ - 'asadevedamagra āsīt (chā. 3.19.1)
analyzed: nanu kvacid asattvam api prāk utpatteḥ kāryasya vyapadiśati śrutiḥ asat eva idam agre āsīt chā
iti asat vai idam agre āsīt tai iti ca
tasmāt asat vyapadeśāt na prāk utpatteḥ kāryasya sattvam iti ced
na iti brūmaḥ
na hi ayam atyanta asatva abhiprāyeṇa prāk utpatteḥ kāryasya asat vyapadeśaḥ

original: kiṃ tarhi vyākṛtanāmarūpatvāddharmādavyākṛtanāmarūpatvaṃ dharmāntaraṃ tena dharmāntareṇāyamasadvyapadeśaḥ prāgutpatteḥ sata eva kāryasya kāraṇarūpeṇānanyasya
analyzed: kim tarhi vyākṛta nāma rūpa tvāt dharmāt avyākṛta nāma rūpa tvam dharma antaram tena dharma antareṇa ayam asat vyapadeśaḥ prāk utpatteḥ sataḥ eva kāryasya kāraṇa rūpeṇa ananyasya
katham etat avagamyate
vākya śeṣāt
yad upakrame saṃdigdha artham vākyam tat śeṣāt niścīyate

original: iha ca tāvat 'asadevedamagra āsīt' ityasacchabdenopakrame nirdiṣṭaṃ yattadeva punastacchabdena parāmṛśya saditi viśinaṣṭi 'tatsadāsīt' iti
analyzed: iha ca tāvat asat eva idam agre āsīt iti asat śabdena upakrame nirdiṣṭam yat tat eva punar tad śabdena parāmṛśya sat iti viśinaṣṭi tat sat āsīt iti
asataḥ ca pūrva apara kāla asaṃbandhāt āsīt śabda anupapatteḥ ca

original: 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' ityatrāpi 'tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta' iti vākyaśeṣe viśeṣaṇānnātyantāsattvam /
analyzed: asat vai idam agre āsīt iti atra api tadā ātmānam svayam akuruta iti vākyaśeṣe viśeṣaṇāt na atyanta asattvam
tasmāt dharma antareṇa eva ayam asat vyapadeśaḥ prāk utpatteḥ kāryasya

original: nāmarūpavyākṛtaṃ hi vastu sacchabdārhaṃ loke prasiddham /
analyzed: nāma rūpa vyākṛtam hi vastu sat śabda arham loke prasiddham
atas prāk nāma rūpa vyākaraṇāt asat iva āsīt iva āsīt iti upacaryate

original: FN: agre śūnyamāsīcchūnyādeva jagatabhūditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: agre śūnyam āsīt śūnyāt eva jagat abhūt iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: rāddhānte tu idaṃ jagadagre sṛṣṭeḥ prāgasadavyākṛtanāmarūpatvādasattulyamatisūkṣmaṃ brahmaivāsīt /
analyzed: rāddhānte tu idam jagat agre sṛṣṭeḥ prāk asat avyākṛta nāma rūpa tvāt asat tulyam ati sūkṣmam brahma eva āsīt
tatas brahmaṇaḥ sat vyākṛta nāma rūpam jagat ajāyata iti

original: yukteśca prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya sattvamananyatvaṃ ca kāraṇādavagamyate,

original: nahi dadhyarthibhirmṛttikopādīyate na ghaṭārthibhiḥ kṣīraṃ tadasatkāryavāde nopapadyeta /

analyzed: aviśiṣṭe hi prāk utpatteḥ sarvasya sarvatra asatve kasmāt kṣīrāt eva dadhi utpadyate na mṛttikāyāḥ mṛttikāyāḥ eva ca ghaṭaḥ utpadyate na kṣīrāt

original: athāviśiṣṭe 'pi prāgasattve kṣīra eva dadhnaḥ kaścidatiśayo na mṛttikāyāṃ,

original: śaktiśca kāraṇasya kāryaniyamārthā kalpamānā nānyāsatī vā kāryaṃ niyacchet /

api ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ dravya guṇa ādīnām ca aśva mahiṣa vat bheda buddhi abhāvāt tādātmyam abhyupagantavyam

original: samavāyakalpanāyāmapi samavāyasya samavāyibhiḥ saṃbandhe 'bhyupagamyamāne tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ

original: atha samavāyaḥ svayaṃ saṃbandharūpatvādanapekṣyaivāparaṃ saṃbandhaṃ saṃbadhyate,

original: kathaṃ ca kāryamavayavidravyaṃ kāraṇeṣvavayavadravyeṣu vartamānaṃ vartate /

yadi tāvat samasteṣu varteta tatas vayavi anupalabdhiḥ prasajyeta

original: nahi bahutvaṃ samasteṣvāśrayeṣu vartamānaṃ vyastāśrayagrahaṇena gṛhyate /

anavasthā ca evam prasajyeta
teṣu teṣu ayavayaveṣu vartayitum anyeṣām avayavānām kalpanīya tvāt

original: atha pratyavayavaṃ varteta tadaikatra vyāpāre.'nyatrāvyāpāraḥ syāt /

original: gotvādivatpratyekaṃ parisamāpterna doṣa iti cet / na /

analyzed: yadi go tva ādi vat pratyekam parisamāptaḥ vayavī syāt yathā go tvam prati vyakti pratyakṣam gṛhyate evam avayavī api prati avayavam pratyakṣam gṛhyeta
na ca evam niyatam gṛhyate

original: pratyekaparisamāptau cāvayavinaḥ kāryeṇādhikārāttasya caikatvācchṛṅgeṇāpi stanakāryaṃ kuryādurasā ca pṛṣṭhakāryam /

na ca evam dṛśyate

original: prāgutpatteśca kāryasyāsattva utpattirakartṛkā nirātmikā ca syāt /

original: kriyā ca nāma syādakartṛkā ceti vipratiṣidhyeta /
analyzed: kriyā ca nāma syāt akartṛkā ca iti vipratiṣidhyeta

original: ghaṭasya cetpattirucyamānā na ghaṭakartṛkā kiṃ tarihyanyakartṛketi kalpyā syāt /

original: tathāca sati ghaṭa utpadyata ityukte kulālādīnāmapyutpadyamānatā pratīyate /

nanu evam sati kāraka vyāpāraḥ narthakaḥ prasajyeta

original: nahi devadattaḥ saṃkocitahastapādaḥ prasāritahastapādaśca viśeṣaṇa dṛśyamāno 'pi vastvanyatvaṃ gacchati,

pitṛ ādi vyavahāra lopa prasaṅgaḥ ca
etena kṣaṇabhaṅga vādaḥ prativaditavyaḥ

analyzed: yathā loke kasyacid āpta eṣaṇasya vā vyatiriktam kiñcid prayojanam abhisaṃdhāya kevalam līlā rūpāḥ pravṛttayaḥ krīḍā vihāreṣu bhavanti

original: yathā cocchvāsapraśvāsādayo 'nabhisaṃdhāya bāhyaṃ kiñcitprayojanaṃ svabhāvādeva saṃbhavanti
analyzed: yathā ca ucchvāsa praśvāsa ādayaḥ na abhisaṃdhāya bāhyam kiñcid prayojanam svabhāvāt eva saṃbhavanti

original: evamīśvarasyāpyanapekṣya kiñcitprayojanāntaraṃ svabhāvādeva kevalaṃ līlārūpā pravṛttirbhaviṣyati /
analyzed: evam īśvarasya api an apekṣya kiñcid prayojana antaram svabhāvāt eva kevalam līlā rūpā pravṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: na hīśvarasya prayojanāntaraṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ nyāyataḥ śrutito vā saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na hi īśvarasya prayojana antaram nirūpyamāṇam nyāyataḥ śrutitaḥ vā saṃbhavati
na ca svabhāvaḥ paryanuyoktum śakyate

original: yadyapyasmākamiyaṃ jagadbimbaviracanā gurutarasaṃrambhevābhāti tathāpi parameśvarasya līlaiva kevaleyaṃ,
analyzed: yadi api asmākam iyam jagat bimba viracanā gurutara saṃrambhā iva ābhāti tathā api parameśvarasya līlā eva kevalā iyam
aparimita śakti tvāt

original: yadi nāma loke līlāsvapi kiñcitsūkṣmaṃ prayojanamutprekṣyeta tathāpi naivātra kiñcitprayojanamutprekṣituṃ śakyate,
analyzed: yadi nāma loke līlāsu api kiñcid sūkṣmam prayojanam utprekṣyeta tathā api nā eva atra kiñcid prayojanam utprekṣitum śakyate
āpta kāma śruteḥ
na api apravṛttiḥ unmatta pravṛttiḥ vā
sṛṣṭi śruteḥ
sarvajña śruteḥ ca

brahma ātmabhāva pratipādana paratvāt ca iti etat api nā eva vismartavyam
vyatiriktam līlāyāḥ sakāśāt iti yāvat

sarvajña tva śruteḥ unmatta tā na asti iti vibhāgaḥ
vaiṣamya nairghṛṇya adhikaraṇam sū

original: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,1.34 /
analyzed: vaiṣamya nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣa tvāt tathā hi darśayati
punar ca jagat janma ādi hetutvam īśvarasya ākṣipyate sthūṇā nikhanana nyāyena pratijñātasya arthasya dṛḍhīkaraṇāya
na īśvaraḥ jagataḥ kāraṇam upapadyate

vaiṣamya nairghṛṇya prasaṅgāt
kāṃścid atyanta sukha bhājaḥ karoti deva ādīn

original: kāṃścinmadhyamabhogabhājo manuṣyādīnītyevaṃ viṣamāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nirmimāṇasyaiśvarasya pṛthagjanasyeva rāgadveṣopapatteḥ /
analyzed: kāṃścid madhyama bhoga bhājaḥ manuṣya ādīni iti evam viṣamām sṛṣṭim nirmimāṇasya aiśvarasya pṛthagjanasya iva rāga dveṣa upapatteḥ
śruti smṛti avadhārita svaccha tvāt īśvara svabhāva vilopaḥ prasajyeta

original: tathā khalajanairapi jugupsitaṃ nirghṛṇatvamatikrūratvaṃ duḥkhayogavidhānātsarvaprajopasaṃhārācca prasajyeta /
analyzed: tathā khala janaiḥ api jugupsitam nirghṛṇa tvam ati krūra tvam duḥkha yoga vidhānāt sarva prajā upasaṃhārāt ca prasajyeta

original: tasmādvaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaprasaṅgānneśvaraḥ kāraṇamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye neśvarasya prasajyete /
analyzed: tasmāt vaiṣamya nairghṛṇya prasaṅgāt na īśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti evam prāpte brūmaḥ vaiṣamya nairghṛṇye nā īśvarasya prasajyete
kasmāt
sāpekṣa tvāt

original: yadi hi nirapekṣaḥ kevala īśvaro viṣamāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nirmimīte syātāmetau doṣau vaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ ca /
analyzed: yadi hi nirapekṣaḥ kevalaḥ īśvaraḥ viṣamām sṛṣṭim nirmimīte syātām etau doṣau vaiṣamyam nairghṛṇyam ca
na tu nirapekṣasya nirmātṛ tvam asti
sa apekṣaḥ hi īśvaraḥ viṣamām sṛṣṭim nirmimīte
kim apekṣate iti ced
dharma adharmau apekṣate iti vadāmaḥ
atas sṛjyamāna prāṇi dharma adharma apekṣā viṣamā sṛṣṭiḥ iti na ayam īślavarasya aparādhaḥ
īśvaraḥ tu parjanya vat draṣṭavyaḥ

original: yathāhi parjanyo vrīhiyavādisṛṣṭau sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: yathā hi parjanyaḥ vrīhi yava ādi sṛṣṭau sādhāraṇam kāraṇam bhavati

original: vrīhiyavādivaiṣamye tu tattadbījagatānyevāsādhāraṇāni sāmarthyāni kāraṇāni bhavanti,
analyzed: vrīhi yava ādi vaiṣamye tu tad tad bīja gatāni evā asādhāraṇāni sāmarthyāni kāraṇāni bhavanti
evam īśvaraḥ deva manuṣya ādi sṛṣṭau sādhāraṇam kāraṇam kṣavati

original: devamanuṣyādivaiṣamye tu tattajjīvagatānyevāsādhāraṇāni karmāṇi kāraṇāni bhavantyevamīśvaraḥ sāpekṣatvānna vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyābhyāṃ duṣyati
analyzed: deva manuṣya ādi vaiṣamye tu tad tad jīva gatāni evā asādhāraṇāni karmāṇi kāraṇāni bhavanti evam īśvaraḥ sāpekṣa tvāt na vaiṣamya nairghṛṇyābhyām duṣyati

original: kathaṃ punaravagamyate sāpekṣa īśvaro nīcamadhyamottamaṃ saṃsāraṃ nirmimīta iti /
analyzed: katham punar avagamyate sa apekṣaḥ īśvaraḥ nīca madhyama uttamam saṃsāram nirmimīte iti

original: tathāhi darśayati śrutiḥ - 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣata eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate'  #
analyzed: tathā hi darśayati śrutiḥ eṣa hi eva sādhu karma kārayati tam yam ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ unninīṣate eṣaḥ u eva asādhu karma kārayati tam yam adhas ninīṣate  /
kaubrāḥ iti

original: 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena' (bṛ. 3.2.13) iti ca /
analyzed: puṇyaḥ vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena iti ca

original: smṛtirapi prāṇikarmaviśeṣāpekṣameveśvarasyānugrahītatvaṃ ca darśayati- 'ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃstathaiva bhajāmyaham' (bha.gī. 4.11)
analyzed: smṛtiḥ api prāṇi karma viśeṣa apekṣam eva īśvarasya anugrahītatvam ca darśayati ye yathā mām prapadyante tān tathā eva bhajāmi aham bhagī
iti evañjātīyakā
pṛthagjanaḥ pāmaraḥ

original: yaṃ janumunninīṣate ūrdhvaṃ netumicchati taṃ sādhu kārayatyeṣa īśvara ityanvayaḥ /
analyzed: yam janum unninīṣate ūrdhvam netum icchati tam sādhu kārayati eṣaḥ īśvaraḥ iti anvayaḥ

original: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvād / BBs_2,1.35 /
analyzed: na karma avibhāgāt iti ced na anādi tvāt
sat eva somya idam agre āsīt ekam eva advitīyam chā

original: iti prāksṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāraṇānnāsti karma yadapekṣya viṣamā sṛṣṭiḥ syāt /

sṛṣṭi uttara kālam hi śarīra ādi vibhāga apekṣam karma
karma apekṣaḥ ca śarīra ādi vibhāgaḥ iti itaretarāśraya tvam prasajyeta

original: ato vibhāgādūrdhvaṃ karmāpekṣa īśvaraḥ pravartatāṃ nāma /

na eṣa doṣaḥ
anādi tvāt saṃsārasya
bhavet eṣa doṣaḥ yadi ādimān saṃsāraḥ syāt

original: anādau tu saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravaddhetumadbhāvena karmaṇaḥ sargavaiṣamyasya ca pravṛttirna virudhyate // 35 //
analyzed: anādau tu saṃsāre bīja aṅ kura vat hetumat bhāvena karmaṇaḥ sarga vaiṣamyasya ca pravṛttiḥ na virudhyate  /
katham punar avagamyate nādiḥ eṣa saṃsāraḥ iti
atas uttaram paṭhati
upapadyate ca api upalabhyate ca  /
upapadyate ca saṃsārasya anādi tvam
ādimattve hi saṃsārasya akasmāt udbhūteḥ muktānām api punar saṃsāra udbhūti prasaṅgaḥ
akṛta abhyāgama prasaṅgaḥ ca

rāga ādi kleśa vāsanā ākṣipta karma apekṣā tu avidyā vaiṣamya karī syāt
na ca karma antareṇa śarīram saṃbhavati
na ca śarīram antareṇa karma saṃbhavati iti itaretarāśraya tva prasaṅgaḥ

original: anāditve tu bījāṅ kuranyāyenopapatterna kaściddoṣo bhavati /

upalabhyate ca saṃsārasya anādi tvam śruti smṛtyoḥ
śrutau tāvat anena jīvena ātmanā chā

original: iti sargapramukhe śārīramātmānaṃ jīvaśabdena prāṇadhāraṇanimittenābhilapannanādiḥ saṃsāra iti darśayati /
analyzed: iti sarga pramukhe śārīram ātmānam jīva śabdena prāṇa dhāraṇa nimittena abhilapan anādiḥ saṃsāraḥ iti darśayati

original: ādimattve tu prāganavadhāritaprāṇaḥ san kathaṃ prāṇādadhāraṇanimittena jīvaśabdena sargapramukhe 'bhilapyeta /
analyzed: ādimattve tu prāk anavadhārita prāṇaḥ san katham prāṇāt adhāraṇa nimittena jīva śabdena sarga pramukhe bhilapyeta
na ca dhārayiṣyati iti atas bhilapyeta
anāgatāt hi saṃndhāt atītaḥ saṃbandhaḥ balavān bhavati
abhiniṣpanna tvāt

iti ca mantra varṇaḥ pūrva kalpa sadbhāvam darśayati

original: smṛtāvapyanāditvaṃ saṃsārasyopalabhyate- 'na rūpamasyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādirna ca saṃpratiṣṭhā' (gī. 15.3) iti /
analyzed: smṛtau api anādi tvam saṃsārasya upalabhyate na rūpam asya iha tathā upalabhyate na antaḥ na ca ādiḥ na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā iti

original: purāṇe cātītānāgatānāṃ ca kalpanāṃ na parimāṇamastīti sthāpitam // 36 //
analyzed: purāṇe ca atīta anāgatānām ca kalpanām na parimāṇam asti iti sthāpitam
sarva dharma upapatti adhikaraṇam sū
sarva dharma upapatteḥ ca

original: cetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiścetyasminnavadhārite vedārthe parairupakṣiptānvilakṣaṇatvādīndoṣānparyahārṣīdācāryaḥ /
analyzed: cetanam brahma jagataḥ kāraṇam prakṛtiḥ ca iti asmin avadhārite veda arthe paraiḥ upakṣiptān vilakṣaṇa tva ādīn doṣān paryahārṣīt ācāryaḥ

original: idānīṃ parapakṣapratiṣedhapradhānaṃ prakaraṇaṃ prāripsamāṇaḥ svapakṣaparigrahapradhānaṃ prakaraṇamupasaṃharati /
analyzed: idānīm parapakṣa pratiṣedha pradhānam prakaraṇam prāripsamāṇaḥ sva pakṣa parigraha pradhānam prakaraṇam upasaṃharati

original: yasmādasminbrahmaṇi kāraṇe parigṛhyamāṇe pradarśitena prakāreṇa sarve kāraṇadharmā upapadyante 'sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti mahāmāyaṃ ca brahma' iti,
analyzed: yasmāt asmin brahmaṇi kāraṇe parigṛhyamāṇe pradarśitena prakāreṇa sarve kāraṇa dharmāḥ upapadyante sarvajñam sarva śakti mahā māyam ca brahma iti
tasmāt an atiśaṅkanīyam idam aupaniṣadam darśanam iti

original: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 1 // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
analyzed: iti śrī govinda bhagavat pūjya pāda śiṣya śaṅkara bhagavat pūjya pāda kṛtau śārīraka mīmāṃsā bhāṣye dvitīya adhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ  /
racanā anupapatteḥ ca na anumānam

original: yadyapīdaṃ vedāntavākyānāmaidaṃparyaṃ nirūpayituṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttaṃ na tarkśāstravat devalābhir yuktibhiḥ kaṃcit siddhāntaṃ sādhayituṃ dūṣayituṃ  #
analyzed: yadi api idam vedānta vākyānām aidaṃparyam nirūpayitum śāstram pravṛttam na tarka śāstra vat devalābhiḥ yuktibhiḥ kaṃcid siddhāntam sādhayitum dūṣayitum
vā pravṛttam

original: tathāpi vedāntavākyam api vyācakṣāṇaiḥ samyagdarśanapratipakṣabhūtāni sāṃkhyādidarśanāni nirākaraṇīyāṇīti tadarthaḥ paraḥ pādaḥ pravartate
analyzed: tathā api vedānta vākyam api vyācakṣāṇaiḥ samyak darśana pratipakṣa bhūtāni sāṃkhya ādi darśanāni nirākaraṇīyāṇi iti tad arthaḥ paraḥ pādaḥ pravartate

original: vedāntārthanirṇayasya ca samyagdarśanārthatvāt tannirṇayena svapakṣasthāpanaṃ prathamaṃ kṛtaṃ taddyabhyarhitaṃ parapakṣapratyākhyānād iti /
analyzed: vedānta artha nirṇayasya ca samyak darśana artha tvāt tad nirṇayena sva pakṣa sthāpanam prathamam kṛtam tat di abhyarhitam para pakṣa pratyākhyānāt iti

original: nanu mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣasādhanatvena samyagdarśananirūpaṇāya svapakṣasthāpanam eva kevalaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ kiṃ parapakṣanirākaraṇena paradveṣakareṇa
analyzed: nanu mumukṣūṇām mokṣa sādhana tvena samyak darśana nirūpaṇāya sva pakṣa sthāpanam eva kevalam kartum yuktam kim para pakṣa nirākaraṇena para dveṣa kareṇa
bāḍham evam

original: tathāpi mahājanaparigṛhītāni mahānti sāṃkhyāditantrāṇi samyagdarśanāpadeśena pravṛttānyupalabhya bhavet keṣāṃcin mandamatīnām etāny api samyagdarśanāyopadeyānītyapekṣā
analyzed: tathā api mahājana parigṛhītāni mahānti sāṃkhya ādi tantrāṇi samyak darśana apadeśena pravṛttāni upalabhya bhavet keṣāṃcid manda matīnām etāni api samyak darśanāya upadeyāni iti apekṣā

original: tathā yuktagāḍhatvasaṃbhavena sarvajñabhāṣitatvācca śraddhā ca teṣvityatastadasāratopapādanāya prayatyate /
analyzed: tathā yukta gāḍha tva saṃbhavena sarvajña bhāṣita tvāt ca śraddhā ca teṣu iti atas tad asāra tā upapādanāya prayatyate
nanu īkṣateḥ na aśabdam brasū
kāmāt ca na anumāna apekṣā brasū
etena sarve vyākhyātāḥ vyākhyātāḥ brasū
iti ca pūrvatra api sāṃkhya ādi pakṣa pratikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ
kim punar kṛta karaṇena iti

original: taducyate- sāṃkhyādayaḥ svapakṣasthāpanāya vedāntavākyānyapyudāhṛtya svapakṣānuguṇenaiva yojayanto vyācakṣate,
analyzed: tat ucyate sāṃkhya ādayaḥ sva pakṣa sthāpanāya vedānta vākyāni api udāhṛtya sva pakṣa anuguṇena eva yojayantaḥ vyācakṣate

original: teṣāṃ yadvyākhyānaṃ tadvyākhyanābhāsaṃ na samyagvyakhyānamityetāvatpūrvaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: teṣām yat vyākhyānam tat vyākhyana ābhāsam na samyak vyakhyānam iti etāvat pūrvam kṛtam

original: iha tu vākyanirapekṣaḥ svatantrastadyuktipratiṣedhaḥ kriyata ityeṣa viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: iha tu vākya nirapekṣaḥ svatantraḥ tad yukti pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate iti eṣa viśeṣaḥ

original: tatra sāṃkhyā manyante- yathā ghaṭaśarāvādayo bhedā mṛdātmanānvīyamānā mṛdātmakasāmānyapūrvakā loke dṛṣṭāḥ,
analyzed: tatra sāṃkhyāḥ manyante yathā ghaṭa śarāva ādayaḥ bhedāḥ mṛd ātmanā anvīyamānāḥ mṛd ātmaka sāmānya pūrvakāḥ loke dṛṣṭāḥ

original: tathā sarva eva bāhyādhyātmikā bhedāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmatayānvīyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasāmānyapūrvikā bhavitumarhanti /
analyzed: tathā sarve eva bāhya ādhyātmikāḥ bhedāḥ sukha duḥkha moha ātma tayā anvīyamānāḥ sukha duḥkha moha ātmaka sāmānya pūrvikāḥ bhavitum arhanti

original: yattatsukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ tatttriguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ mṛdvadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣārthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvenaiva vicitreṇa vikārātmanā  #
analyzed: yat tat sukha duḥkha moha ātmakam sāmānyam tat triguṇam pradhānam mṛd vat acetanam cetanasya puruṣa artham sādhayitum svabhāvena eva vicitreṇa vikāra ātmanā
vivartate iti
tathā pariṇāma ādibhiḥ api liṅgaiḥ tat eva pradhānam anuminute
tatra vadāmaḥ yadi dṛṣṭānta balena eva etat nirūpyeta
na acetanam loke cetanā anadhiṣṭhitam svatantram kiñcid viśiṣṭa puruṣa artha nirvartana samarthān vikārān viracayat dṛṣṭam

original: gehaprāsādaśayanāsanavihārabhūmyādayo hi loke prajñāvadbhiḥ śilpibhiryathākālaṃ sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārayogyā racitā dṛśyante /
analyzed: geha prāsāda śayana āsana vihāra bhūmi ādayaḥ hi loke prajñāvadbhiḥ śilpibhiḥ yathākālam sukha duḥkha prāpti parihāra yogyāḥ racitāḥ dṛśyante

parimārjana ādi apekṣā ca asya asti iti anupanyāsaḥ puruṣa aśma vat iti

original: tathā pradhānasyācaitanyātpuruṣasya caudāsīnyāttṛtīyasya ca tayoḥ saṃbandhayiturabhāvātsaṃbandhānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: tathā pradhānasya ācaitanyāt puruṣasya ca audāsīnyāt tṛtīyasya ca tayoḥ saṃbandhayituḥ abhāvāt saṃbandha anupapattiḥ
yogyatā nimitte ca saṃbandhe yogyatā anucchedāt anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ
pūrvavat ca iha api artha abhāvaḥ vikalpayitavyaḥ
paramātmanaḥ tu svarūpa vyapāśrayam audāsīnyam māyā vyapāśrayam ca pravartaka tvam iti asti atiśayaḥ
aṅgi tva anupapatteḥ ca
itas ca na pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ avalpate
yat hi sattva rajaḥ tamasām anyonya guṇa pradhāna bhāvam utsṛjya sāmyena svarūpa mātreṇa avasthānam sā pradhāna avasthā
tasyām avasthāyām anapekṣa svarūpāṇām sva rūpa praṇāśa bhayāt parasparam pratyaṅgi bhāva anupapatteḥ
bāhyasya ca kasyacid kṣobhayituḥ abhāvāt guṇa vaiṣamya nimittaḥ mahat ādi utpādaḥ na syāt
anyathā anumitau ca jña śakti viyogāt

original: athāpi syādanyathā vayamanumimīmahe yathā nāyamanantaro doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
analyzed: atha api syāt anyathā vayam anumimīmahe yathā na ayam anantaraḥ doṣaḥ prasajyeta
nahi anapekṣa svabhāvāḥ kūṭasthāḥ ca asmābhiḥ guṇāḥ abhyupagamyante pramāṇa abhāvāt
kārya vaśena tu guṇānām svabhāvaḥ bhyupagamyate

original: yathā yathā kāryotpāda upapadyate tathā tathaiṣāṃ svabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate /
analyzed: yathā yathā kārya utpādaḥ upapadyate tathā tathā eṣām svabhāvaḥ bhyupagamyate
calam guṇa vṛttam iti ca asti abhyupagamaḥ

original: tasmātsāmyāvasthāyāmapi vaiṣamyopagamayogyā eva guṇā avatiṣṭhanta iti /
analyzed: tasmāt sāmya avasthāyām api vaiṣamya upagama yogyāḥ eva guṇāḥ avatiṣṭhante iti

original: evamapi pradhānasya jñaśaktiviyogādracanānupapattyādayaḥ pūrvoktā doṣāstadavasthā eva /
analyzed: evam api pradhānasya jña śakti viyogāt racanā anupapatti ādayaḥ pūrva uktāḥ doṣāḥ tad avasthāḥ eva
jña śaktim api tu anumimānaḥ prativādi tvāt nivarteta
cetanam ekam aneka prapañcasya jagataḥ upādānam iti brahma vāda prasaṅgāt

original: vaiṣamyopagamayogyā api guṇāḥ sāmyāvasthāyāṃ nimittābhāvānnaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeran /
analyzed: vaiṣamya upagama yogyāḥ api guṇāḥ sāmya avasthāyām nimitta abhāvāt na eva vaiṣamyam bhajeran

original: bhajamānā vā nimittābhāvāviśeṣātsarvadaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeranniti prasajyata evāyamanantaro 'pi doṣaḥ // 9 //
analyzed: bhajamānāḥ vā nimitta abhāva aviśeṣāt sarvadā eva vaiṣamyam bhajeran iti prasajyate eva ayam anantaraḥ pi doṣaḥ
vipratiṣedhāt ca asamañjasam
paraspara viruddhaḥ ca ayam sāṃkhyānām abhyupagamaḥ
kvacid sapta indriyāṇi anukrāmanti
kvacid ekādaśa
tathā kvacid mahataḥ tanmātra sargam upadiśanti
kvacid ahaṅkīrāt
tathā kvacid trīṇi antaḥkaraṇāni varṇayanti kvacid ekam iti

original: prasiddha eva tu śrutyeśvarakāraṇavādinyā virodhastadanuvartinyā ca smṛtyā /
analyzed: prasiddhaḥ eva tu śrutyā īśvara kāraṇa vādinyāḥ virodhaḥ tad anuvartinyā ca smṛtyā
tasmāt api asamañjasam sāṃkhyānām darśanam iti
atra āha nanu aupaniṣadānām api asamañjasam eva darśanam tapya tāpakayoḥ jāti antara bhāva anabhyupagamāt

original: ekaṃ hi brahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvasya prapañcasya kāraṇamabhyupagacchatāmekasyaivātmano viśeṣau tapyatāpakau na jātyantarabhūtāvityabhyupagantavyaṃ  #
analyzed: ekam hi brahma sarva ātmakam sarvasya prapañcasya kāraṇam abhyupagacchatām ekasya eva ātmanaḥ viśeṣau tapya tāpakau na jāti antara bhūtau iti abhyupagantavyam
syāt

original: yadi cetau tapyatāpakāvekasyātmano viśeṣau syātāṃ sa tābhyāṃ tapyatāpakābhyāṃ na nirmucyata iti tāpopaśāntaye samyagdarśanamupadiśacchāstramanarthakaṃ  #
analyzed: yadi cetau tapya tāpakau ekasya ātmanaḥ viśeṣau syātām sa tābhyām tapya tāpakābhyām na nirmucyate iti tāpa upaśāntaye samyak darśanam upadiśat śāstram anarthakam
syāt

original: nahyauṣṇyaprakāśadharmakasya pradīpasya tadavasthasyaiva tābhyāṃ nirmokṣa upapadyate /
analyzed: nahi auṣṇya prakāśa dharmakasya pradīpasya tad avasthasya eva tābhyām nirmokṣaḥ upapadyate
yaḥ pi jala taraṅga vīcī phena ādi upanyāsaḥ

original: tatrāpi jalātmana ekasya vīcyādanyo viśeṣā āvirbhāvatirobhāvarūpeṇa nityā eveti samāno jalātmano vīcyādibhiranirmokṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra api jala ātmanaḥ ekasya vīcyāt anyaḥ viśeṣāḥ āvirbhāva tirobhāva rūpeṇa nityāḥ eva iti samānaḥ jala ātmanaḥ vīci ādibhiḥ anirmokṣaḥ
prasiddhaḥ ca ayam tapya tāpakayoḥ jāti antara bhāvaḥ loke
tathā hi arthī ca arthaḥ ca anyonya bhinnau labhyete
yadi arthinaḥ svatas na syāt

original: yasyārthino yadviṣayamarthitvaṃ sa tasyārtho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ syāt,
analyzed: yasya arthinaḥ yad viṣayam arthi tvam sa tasya arthaḥ nitya siddhaḥ eva iti na tasya tad viṣayam arthi tvam syāt

original: yathā prakāśātmanaḥ pradīpasya prakāśākhyortho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yathā prakāśa ātmanaḥ pradīpasya prakāśa ākhyaḥ arthaḥ nitya siddhaḥ eva iti na tasya tad viṣayam arthi tvam bhavati
aprāpte hi arthe rthinaḥ rthi tvam syāt iti
na syāt
yadi syāt svārtha tvam eva syāt
na ca etat asti
saṃbandhi śabdaḥ hi etau arthī ca arthaḥ ca iti
dvayoḥ ca saṃbandhinoḥ saṃbandhaḥ syāt na ekasya eva
tasmāt bhinnau etau artha arthinau
tathā anartha anarthinau api
arthinaḥ nukūlaḥ ṛthaḥ pratikūlaḥ narthaḥ tābhyām eka paryāyeṇa ubhābhyām saṃbadhyate
tatra arthasya alpīyaḥ tvāt bhūyaḥ tvāt ca anarthasya ubhau api artha anarthau anartham eva iti tāpakaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: tapyastu puruṣo ya ekaḥ paryāyeṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata iti tayostapyatāpakayorekātmatāyāṃ mokṣānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: tapyaḥ tu puruṣaḥ yaḥ ekaḥ paryāyeṇa ubhābhyām saṃbadhyate iti tayoḥ tapya tāpakayoḥ eka ātma tāyām mokṣa anupapattiḥ
jāti antara bhāve tu tad saṃyoga hetu parihārāt syāt api kadācid mokṣa upapattiḥ iti
atra ucyate na
eka tvāt eva tapya tāpaka bhāva anupapatteḥ

original: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvānyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātām /
analyzed: bhavet eṣa doṣaḥ yadi eka ātma tāyām tapya tāpakau ā anyonyasya viṣaya viṣayi bhāvam pratipadyeyātām
na tu etat asti ekatvāt eva

original: nahyagnirekaḥ sansvamātmānaṃ dahati prakāśayati vā satyapyauṣṇyaprakāśādidharmabhede pariṇāmitve ca /
analyzed: na hi agniḥ ekaḥ san svam ātmānam dahati prakāśayati vā sati api auṣṇya prakāśa ādi dharma bhede pariṇāmi tve ca
kim kūṭasthe brahmaṇi ekasmin tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ saṃbhavet
kva punar ayam tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ syāt iti

original: ucyate- kiṃ na paśyasi karmabhūto jīvaddehastapyastāpakaḥ saviteti /
analyzed: ucyate kim na paśyasi karma bhūtaḥ jīvat dehaḥ tapyaḥ tāpakaḥ savitā iti

original: nanu taptirnāma duḥkhaṃ sā cetayiturnācetanasya dehasya /
analyzed: nanu taptiḥ nāma duḥkham sā cetayituḥ na acetanasya dehasya

original: yadi hi dehasyaiva taptiḥ syātsā dehanāśe svayameva naśyatīti tannāśāya sādhanaṃ naiṣitavyaṃ syāditi /
analyzed: yadi hi dehasya eva taptiḥ syāt sā deha nāśe svayam eva naśyati iti tad nāśāya sādhanam nā eṣitavyam syāt iti

original: ucyate- dehābhāve 'pi kevalasya cetanasya taptirna dṛṣṭā /
analyzed: ucyate deha abhāve pi kevalasya cetanasya taptiḥ na dṛṣṭā

original: naca tvayāpi taptirnāma vikriyā cetayituḥ kevalasyeṣyate /
analyzed: na ca tvayā api taptiḥ nāma vikriyā cetayituḥ kevalasya iṣyate
nā api deha cetanayoḥ saṃhata tvam aśuddhi ādi doṣa prasaṅgāt
na ca tapteḥ eva taptim abhyupagacchati

original: kathaṃ tavāpi tapyatāpakabhāvaḥ sattvaṃ tapyaṃ tāpakaṃ raja iti cet / na /
analyzed: katham tava api tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ sattvam tapyam tāpakam rajaḥ iti ced na
tābhyām cetanasya saṃhata tva anupapatteḥ
sattva anurodhi tvāt cetanā u pi tapyate iva iti ced
paramārthataḥ tarhi nā eva tapyate iti āpatati iva śabda prayogāt
na ced tapyate na iva śabdaḥ doṣāya

original: nahi ḍuṇḍubhaḥ sarpaṃ ivetyetāvatā saviṣo bhavati /
analyzed: nahi ḍuṇḍubhaḥ sarpam iva iti etāvatā sa viṣaḥ bhavati

original: sarpo vā ḍuṇḍubha ivetyetāvatā nirviṣo bhavati /
analyzed: sarpaḥ vā ḍuṇḍubhaḥ iva iti etāvatā nirviṣaḥ bhavati
atas ca avidyā kṛtaḥ yam tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ na pāramārthikaḥ iti abhyupagantavyam iti
nā evam sati mama api kiñcid duṣyati

original: atha pāramārthikameva cetanasya tapyatvamabhyupagacchasi tavaiva sutarāmanirmokṣaḥ prasajyeta ,
analyzed: atha pāramārthikam eva cetanasya tapya tvam abhyupagacchasi tava eva sutarām anirmokṣaḥ prasajyeta
nitya tva abhyupagamāt ca tāpakasya
tapya tāpaka śaktyoḥ nitya tve pi sa nimitta saṃyoga apekṣa tva āpatteḥ saṃyoga nimitta adarśana nivṛttau ātyantikaḥ saṃyoga uparamaḥ

original: tataścātyantiko mokṣa upapanna iti cet / na /
analyzed: tatas ca ātyantikaḥ mokṣaḥ upapannaḥ iti ced na
adarśanasya tamasaḥ nitya tva abhyupagamāt
guṇānām ca udbhāva abhibhavayoḥ aniyata tvāt aniyataḥ saṃyoga nimitta uparamaḥ iti viyogasya api aniyata tvāt sāṃkhyasya eva anirmokṣaḥ parihāryaḥ syāt

original: aupaniṣadasya tvātmaikatvābhyupagamādekasya ca viṣayaviṣayibhāvānupapattervikārabhedasya ca vācārambhaṇamātratvaśravaṇādanirmokṣaśaṅkā svapne  #
analyzed: aupaniṣadasya tu ātma ekatva abhyupagamāt ekasya ca viṣaya viṣayi bhāva anupapatteḥ vikāra bhedasya ca vācā ārambhaṇa mātra tva śravaṇāt anirmokṣa śaṅkā svapne
pi na upajāyate

original: vyavahāre tu yatra yathā dṛṣṭastapyatāpakabhāvastatra tathaiva sa iti na codayitavyaḥ parihartavyo vā bhavati // 10 // @----------------------
analyzed: vyavahāre tu yatra yathā dṛṣṭaḥ tapya tāpaka bhāvaḥ tatra tathā eva saḥ iti na codayitavyaḥ parihartavyaḥ vā bhavati  /
tvac yātram eva hi buddhīndriyam aneka rūpa ādi grahaṇa samartham ekam

ekam iti buddhiḥ eva
mahat dīrgha adhikaraṇam su
pradhāna kāraṇa vādaḥ nirākṛtaḥ
paramāṇu kāraṇa vādaḥ idānīm nirākartavyaḥ

original: tatrādau tāvadyo 'ṇuvādinā brahmavādini doṣa utprekṣyate sa pratisamādhīyate /
analyzed: tatra ādau tāvat yaḥ ṇu vādinā brahma vādini doṣaḥ utprekṣyate sa pratisamādhīyate

original: tatrāyaṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāmabhyupagamaḥ - kāraṇadravyasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhante,
analyzed: tatra ayam vaiśeṣikāṇām abhyupagamaḥ kāraṇa dravya samavāyinaḥ guṇāḥ kārya dravye samāna jātīyam guṇa antaram ārabhante
śuklebhyaḥ tantubhyaḥ śuklasya paṭasya prasava darśanāt tad viparyaya a darśanāt ca

original: tasmāccetanasya brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve 'bhyupagamyamāne kārye 'pi jagati cetanyaṃ samaveyāt /
analyzed: tasmāt cetanasya brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇatve bhyupagamyamāne kārye pi jagati cetanyam samaveyāt

original: tadadarśanāttu na cetanaṃ brahma jagatkāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhatīti /
analyzed: tad adarśanāt tu na cetanam brahma jagat kāraṇam bhavitum arhati iti
imam abhyupagamam tadīyayā eva prakriyayā vyabhicārayati
mahat dīrgha vat vā hrasva parimaṇḍalābhyām

original: eṣā teṣāṃ prakriyā- paramāṇavaḥ kila kañcitkālamanārabdhakāryā yathāyogaṃ rūpādimantaḥ pārimaṇḍalyaparimāṇaśca tiṣṭhanti /
analyzed: eṣā teṣām prakriyā paramāṇavaḥ kila kañcid kālam anārabdha kāryāḥ yathāyogam rūpa ādimantaḥ pārimaṇḍalya parimāṇaḥ ca tiṣṭhanti

original: te ca paścādadṛṣṭādipuraḥsarāḥ saṃyogasacivāśca santo dvyaṇukādikrameṇa kṛtsnaṃ kāryajātamārabhante /
analyzed: te ca paścāt adṛṣṭa ādi puraḥsarāḥ saṃyoga sacivāḥ ca santaḥ dvi aṇuka ādi krameṇa kṛtsnam kārya jātam ārabhante
kāraṇa guṇāḥ ca kārye guṇa antaram

original: yadā dvau paramāṇū dvyaṇukamārabhete tadā paramāṇugatā rūpādiguṇaviśeṣāḥ śuklādayo dvyaṇuke śaklādīnaparānārabhante /
analyzed: yadā dvau paramāṇū dvyaṇukam ārabhete tadā paramāṇu gatāḥ rūpa ādi guṇa viśeṣāḥ śukla ādayaḥ dvyaṇuke śakla ādīn aparān ārabhante
paramāṇu guṇa viśeṣaḥ tu pārimāṇḍalyam na dvyaṇuke pārimāṇḍalyam aparam ārabhate
dvi aṇukasya parimāṇa antara yoga abhyupagamāt
aṇu tva hrasva tve hi dvi amuka vartinī parimāṇe varṇayanti

original: yadāpi dve dvyaṇuke caturaṇukamārabhete tadāpi samānaṃ dvyaṇukasamavāyināṃ śuklādīnāmārambhakatvam /
analyzed: yadā api dve dvi aṇuke catur aṇukam ārabhete tadā api samānam dvi aṇuka samavāyinām śukla ādīnām ārambhaka tvam
aṇu tva hrasva tve tu dvyaṇuka samavāyinī api na eva ārabhete
catur aṇukasya mahat tva adīrgha tva parimāṇa yoga abhyupagamāt

original: yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇavo bahūni vā dvyaṇukāni dvyaṇukasahito vā paramāṇuḥ kāryamārabhate tadāpi samānaiṣā yojanā /
analyzed: yadā api bahavaḥ paramāṇavaḥ bahūni vā dvyaṇukāni dvyaṇuka sahitaḥ vā paramāṇuḥ kāryam ārabhate tadā api samānā eṣā yojanā

original: tadevaṃ yathā paramāṇoḥ parimaṇḍalātsato 'ṇu hrasvaṃ ca dvyaṇukaṃ jāyate mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukādi na parimaṇḍalam,
analyzed: tat evam yathā paramāṇoḥ parimaṇḍalāt sataḥ ṇu hrasvam ca dvyaṇukam jāyate mahat dīrgham ca tryaṇuka ādi na parimaṇḍalam

original: yathā vā dvyaṇukādaṇorhrasvācca sato mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukaṃ jāyate nāṇu no hrasvam,
analyzed: yathā vā dvi aṇukāt aṇoḥ hrasvāt ca sataḥ mahat dīrgham ca tryaṇukam jāyate na aṇu no hrasvam

original: evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jagajjaniṣyata ityabyupagame kiṃ tava cchinnam /
analyzed: evam cetanāt brahmaṇaḥ cetanam jagat janiṣyate iti abyupagame kim tava chinnam

original: atha manyase virodhinā parimāṇāntareṇākrāntaṃ kāryadravyaṃ dvyaṇukādītyato nārambhakāṇi kāraṇagatāni pārimaṇḍalyādīnītyabhyupagacchāmi,
analyzed: atha manyase virodhinā parimāṇa antareṇa ākrāntam kārya dravyam dvyaṇuka ādi iti atas na ārambhakāṇi kāraṇa gatāni pārimaṇḍalī ādīni iti abhyupagacchāmi
na tu cetanā virodhinā guṇa antareṇa jagataḥ ākrānta tvam asti

original: yena kāraṇagatā cetanā kārye cetanāntaraṃ nārabheta /
analyzed: yena kāraṇa gatā cetanā kārye cetanā antaram na ārabheta
na hi acetanā nāma cetanā virodhī kaścid guṇaḥ sti
cetanā pratiṣedha mātra tvāt
tasmāt pārimāṇḍalya ādi vaiṣamyāt prāpnoti cetanāyāḥ ārambhaka tvam iti
na evam maṃsthāḥ

original: yathā kāraṇe vidyamānānāmapi pārimāṇḍalyādināmanārambhakatvamevaṃ caitanyasyāpītyasyāṃśasya samānatvāt /
analyzed: yathā kāraṇe vidyamānānām api pārimāṇḍalī ādinām anārambhaka tvam evam caitanyasya api iti asya aṃśasya samāna tvāt
na ca parimāṇa antara krānta tvam pārimāṇḍalī ādīnām ārambhaka tva upapatteḥ
ārabdham api kārya dravyam prāk guṇa ārambhāt kṣaṇa mātram aguṇam tiṣṭhati iti abhyupagamāt

original: naca parimāṇāntarārambhe vyagrāṇi pārimāṇḍalyādīnītyataḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ parimāṇāntaraṃ nārabhante parimāṇāntarasyānyahetutvābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: na ca parimāṇa antara ārambhe vyagrāṇi pārimāṇḍalī ādīni iti atas sva samāna jātīyam parimāṇa antaram na ārabhante parimāṇa antarasya anya hetu tva abhyupagamāt
kāraṇa bahu tvāt kāraṇa mahā tvāt pracaya viśeṣāt ca mahat vai su
tad viparītam aṇu
etena dīrgha tva hrasva tve vyākhyāte
iti hi kāṇabhujāni sūtrāṇi
na ca saṃnidhāna viśeṣāt kutaścid kāraṇa bahu tva ādīni eva ārabhante na pārimāṇḍalya ādīni iti ucyeta

original: saṃyogasacive hyanekasmiṃśca dravye dravyāntarasyārambhake 'bhyupagamyamāna etadevaṃ syāt /

original: sparśaguṇaḥ sūkṣmatamo vāyurityevametāni catvāri bhūtānyupacitāpacitaguṇāni sthūlasūkṣmatarasūkṣmatamatāratamyopetāni ca loke lakṣyante /

original: tathācāhuḥ - 'dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhante guṇāśca guṇāntaram' (vai. sū. 1.1.10) iti /

original: tantugatāśca guṇāḥ śuklādayaḥ kāryadravye paṭe śuklādiguṇāntaramārabhanta iti hi te 'bhyupagacchanti /
analyzed: tantu gatāḥ ca guṇāḥ śukla ādayaḥ kārya dravye paṭe śukla ādi guṇa antaram ārabhante iti hi te bhyupagacchanti

atha apṛthak kāla tvam ayuta sidda tvam ucyeta
savya dakṣiṇayoḥ api go viṣāṇayoḥ ayuta siddha tvam prasajyeta

tasya tādātmyena eva pratīyamāna tvāt

original: yutasiddhayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyogo 'pyutasiddhayostu samavāya ityayamabhyupagamo mṛṣaiva teṣāṃ,

prāk siddhasya kāryāt kāraṇasya ayuta siddha tva anupapatteḥ

original: athānyatarāpekṣa evāyamabhyupagamaḥ syādayutasiddhasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti,
analyzed: atha anyatara apekṣaḥ eva ayam abhyupagamaḥ syāt ayuta siddhasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandhaḥ samavāyaḥ iti

original: evamapi prāgsiddhasyālabdhātmakasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandho nopapadyate dvayāyattatvātsaṃbandhasya /

original: prākkāraṇasaṃbandhātkāryasya siddhāvabhyupagamyamānāyāmayutasiddhyabhāvātkāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyete itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt /

yathā ced panna mātrasya akriyasya kārya dravyasya vibhubhiḥ ākāśa ādibhiḥ dravya antaraiḥ saṃbandhaḥ

original: saṃyoga evābhyupagamyate na samavāya evaṃ kāraṇadravyeṇāpi saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga eva syānna samavāyaḥ /

original: nāpi saṃyogasya samavāyasya vā saṃbandhavyatirekeṇāstitve kiñcitpramāṇamasti /

original: yathaiko 'pi san devadatto loke svarūpaṃ saṃbandhirūpaṃ cāpekṣyānekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati,

original: manuṣyo brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyo vadānyo bālo yuvā sthaviraḥ pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti,

analyzed: catuṣṭaye ca pṛthivī ādi paramāṇavaḥ svara sneha uṣṇa svabhāvāḥ te pṛthivī ādi bhāvena saṃhanyante iti manyante

analyzed: na na aham iti ātmanaḥ darśanam nirvṛttam nihnute yathā agniḥ an uṣṇaḥ prakāśaḥ iti vā

original: tatraivaṃ satyekasya darśanasmaraṇalakṣaṇadvayasaṃbandhe kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamahāniraparihāryā vaināśikasya syāt /
analyzed: tatra evam sati ekasya darśana smaraṇa lakṣaṇa dvaya saṃbandhe kṣaṇika tva abhyupagama hāniḥ aparihāryā vaināśikasya syāt
tathā anantaram anantarām ātmanaḥ eva pratipattim pratyabhijānan eka kartṛ kāma uttamāt ucchvāsāt atītāḥ ca

original: pratipattīrā janmana ātmaikakartṛkāḥ pratisaṃdadhānaḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādī vaināśiko
analyzed: pratipat tīrāḥ janmanaḥ ātma eka kartṛkāḥ pratisaṃdadhānaḥ katham kṣaṇa bhaṅga vādī vaināśikaḥ
na apapeta sa yadi brūyāt sādṛśyāt etat samapatsyate iti
tam pratibrūyāt
tena idam sadṛśam iti dvaya āyatta tvāt sādṛśyasya
kṣaṇabhaṅga vādinaḥ sadṛśayoḥ dvayoḥ vastunoḥ grahītuḥ ekasya abhāvāt
sādṛśya nimittam pratisaṃdhānam iti mithyā pralāpaḥ eva syāt
syāt ced pūrva uttarayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sādṛśyasya grahītā ekaḥ
tathā asati ekasya pīḍyeta

original: tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti pratyayāntaramevedaṃ na pūrvottarakṣaṇadvayagrahaṇanimittamiticet / na /
analyzed: tena idam sadṛśam iti pratyaya antaram eva idam na pūrva uttara kṣaṇa dvaya grahaṇa nimittam iti ced na
tena idam iti
bhinna padārtha upādānāt

original: pratyayāntarameva cetsādṛśyaviṣayaṃ syāttenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vākyaprayogo 'narthakaḥ syāt /
analyzed: pratyaya antaram eva ced sādṛśya viṣayam syāt tena idam sadṛśam iti vākya prayogaḥ narthakaḥ syāt
sādṛśyam iti eva prayogaḥ prāpnuyāt

original: yadā hi lokaprasiddhaḥ padārthaḥ parīkṣakairna parigṛhyate tadā svapakṣasiddhiḥ parapakṣadoṣo vobhayamapyucyamānaṃ parīkṣakāṇāmātmanaśca yathārthatvena  #
analyzed: yadā hi loka prasiddhaḥ padārthaḥ parīkṣakaiḥ na parigṛhyate tadā sva pakṣa siddhiḥ para pakṣa doṣaḥ vā ubhayam api ucyamānam parīkṣakāṇām ātmanaḥ ca yathārtha tvena
na buddhi saṃtānam ārohati
evam eva eṣa ṛthaḥ iti niścitam yat tat eva vaktavyam
tatas bahu pralāpi tvam ātmanaḥ kevalam prakhyāpayet
na ca ayam sādṛśyāt saṃvyavahāraḥ yuktaḥ
tad bhāva avagamāt tad sadṛśa bhāva anavagamāt ca

original: bhavedapi kadācidbāhyavastuni vipralambhasaṃbhavāttadevedaṃ syāttatsadṛśaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ /
analyzed: bhavet api kadācid bāhya vastuni vipralambha saṃbhavāt tat eva idam syāt tat sadṛśam vā iti saṃdehaḥ

original: upalabdhari tu saṃdeho 'pi na kadācidbhavati sa evāhaṃ syāṃ tatsadṛśo veti /
analyzed: upalabdhari tu na kadācid bhavati saḥ eva aham syām tad sadṛśaḥ vā iti

original: ya evāhaṃpūrvedyuradrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya smarāmīti niścitatadbhāvopalambhāt /
analyzed: yaḥ eva aham pūrvedyus adrākṣam saḥ eva aham adya smarāmi iti niścita tad bhāva upalambhāt
tasmāt api anupapannaḥ vaināśika samayaḥ
na asataḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt  /
itas ca anupapannaḥ vaināśika samayaḥ
yatas sthiram anuyāyi kāraṇam an abhyupagacchatām abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ iti etat āpadyate
darśayanti ca abhāvāt bhāva utpattim na an upamṛdya prādurbhāvāt iti
vinaṣṭāt hi kila bījāt aṅ kuraḥ utpadyate
tathā vinaṣṭāt kṣīrāt dadhi
mṛd piṇḍāt ca ghaṭaḥ
kūṭastāt ced kāraṇāt kāryam utpadyeta aviśeṣāt sarvam sarvatas utpadyeta
tasmāt abhāva grastebhyaḥ bīja ādibhyaḥ kura ādīnām utpadyamāna tvāt abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ iti manyante
tatra idam ucyate na asataḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt iti
na abhāvāt bhāvaḥ utpadyate
yadi abhāvāt bhāvaḥ utpadyeta abhāva tva aviśeṣāt kāraṇa viśeṣa abhyupagamaḥ narthakaḥ syāt

original: nahi bījādīnāmupamṛditānāṃ yo 'bhāvastasyābhāvasya śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatvāviśeṣādabhāvatve kaścidviśeṣo 'sti,
analyzed: nahi bīja ādīnām upamṛditānām yaḥ bhāvaḥ tasya abhāvasya śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām ca niḥsvabhāva tva aviśeṣāt abhāva tve kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti

original: yena bījādevāṅ kuro jāyate kṣīrādeva dadhītyevañjātīyakaḥ kāraṇiśeṣaṇādibhyupagamor'thavānsyāt /
analyzed: yena bījāt eva aṅ kuraḥ jāyate kṣīrāt eva dadhi iti evañjātīyakaḥ kāraṇi śeṣaṇa āt ibhyupagama ūrthavān syāt

original: nirviśeṣasya tvabhāvasya kāraṇatvābhyupagame śaśaviṣāṇādibhyo 'pyaṅ kurādayo jāyeran /
analyzed: nirviśeṣasya tu abhāvasya kāraṇa tva abhyupagame śaśaviṣāṇa ādibhyaḥ pi aṅ kura ādayaḥ jāyeran
na ca evam dṛśyate

original: yadi punarabhāvasyāpi viśeṣo 'bhyupagamyetotpalādīnāmiva nīlatvādistato viśeṣavattvādevābhāvasya bhāvatvamutpalādivatprasajyeta /
analyzed: yadi punar abhāvasya api viśeṣaḥ bhyupagamyeta utpala ādīnām iva nīla tva ādiḥ tatas viśeṣavat tvāt eva abhāvasya bhāva tvam utpala ādi vat prasajyeta
na api abhāvaḥ kasyacid utpatti hetuḥ syāt
abhāva tvāt eva
śaśaviṣāṇa ādi vat
ābhāvāt ca bhāva utpattau abhāva anvitam eva sarvam kāryam syāt
na ca evam dṛśyate

original: sarvasya ca vastunaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa bhāvātmanaivopalabhyamānatvāt /
analyzed: sarvasya ca vastunaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa bhāva ātmanā eva upalabhyamāna tvāt
na ca mṛdā anvitāḥ śarāva ādayaḥ bhāvaḥ tantu ādi vikārāḥ kenacid abhyupagamyante
mṛd vikārān eva tu mṛdā anvitān bhāvān lokaḥ pratyeti
yat tu uktam svarūpa upamardam antareṇa kasyacid kūṭasthasya vastunaḥ kāraṇa tvām upapatteḥ abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ bhavitum arhati iti
tat duruktam
sthira svabhāvānām eva suvarṇa ādīnām pratyabhijñāyamānānām rucaka ādi kārya kāraṇa bhāva darśanāt

original: yeṣvapi bījādiṣu svarūpopamarde lakṣyate teṣvarapi nāsāvupamṛdyamānā pūrvāvasthottarāvasthāyāḥ kāraṇamabhyupagamyate,
analyzed: yeṣu api bīja ādiṣu sva rūpa upamarde lakṣyate na asau upamṛdyamānā pūrva avasthā uttara avasthāyāḥ kāraṇam abhyupagamyate
an upamṛdyamānām eva anuyāyinām bīja ādi avayavānām aṅ kura ādi kāraṇa bhāva abhyupagamāt
tasmāt asadbhyaḥ śaśaviṣāṇa ādibhyaḥ sat utpatti adarśanāt sadbhyaḥ ca suvarṇa ādibhyaḥ sat utpatti darśanāt anupapannaḥ yama bhāvāt bhāva utpatti abhyupagamaḥ
api ca caturbhiḥ citta caittāḥ utpadyante

original: paramāṇubhyaśca bhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaḥ samudāya utpadyata ityabhyupagamya punarabhāvādbhāvotpattiṃ kalpayadbhirabhyupagatamapahnuvānairvaināśikaiḥ  #
analyzed: paramāṇubhyaḥ ca bhūta bhautika lakṣaṇaḥ samudāyaḥ utpadyate iti abhyupagamya punar abhāvāt bhāva utpattim kalpayadbhiḥ abhyupagatam apahnuvānaiḥ vaināśikaiḥ
sarvaḥ lokaḥ ākulīkriyate  /
udāsīnānām api ca evam siddhiḥ
yadi ca abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ abhyupagamyeta
evaṃsati udāsīnānām anīhamānānām api janānām abhimata siddhiḥ syāt
abhāvasya sulabha tvāt
kṛṣīvalasya kṣetra karmaṇi aprayatamānasya api sasya niṣpattiḥ syāt
kulālasya ca mṛd saṃskriyāyām aprayatamānasya api amatra utpattiḥ
tantuvāyasya api tantūn a tanvānasya api tanvānasya iva vastra lābhaḥ
svarga apavargayoḥ ca na kaścid kathañcid samīheta
na ca etat yujyate bhyupagamyate vā kenacid
tasmāt api anupapannaḥ yama bhāvāt bhāva utpatti abhyupagamaḥ
an īhamānānām prayatna śūnyānām
amatram ghaṭa ādi pātram
abhāva adhikaraṇam sū
na abhāvaḥ upalabdheḥ

original: evaṃ bāhyārtavādamāśritya samudāyāprāptyādiṣu dūṣaṇeṣūdbhāviteṣu vijñānavādī bauddha idānīṃ pratyavatiṣṭhite /
analyzed: evam bāhya ārta vādam āśritya samudāya aprāpti ādiṣu dūṣaṇeṣu udbhāviteṣu vijñāna vādī bauddhaḥ idānīm pratyavatiṣṭhite

original: keṣāñcitkila bāhye vastunyabhiniveśamālakṣya tadanurodhena bāhyārthavādaprakriyeyaṃ virocitā /
analyzed: keṣāñcid kila bāhye vastuni abhiniveśam ālakṣya tad anurodhena bāhya artha vāda prakriyā iyam virocitā
na asau sugata abhiprāyaḥ
tasya tu vijñāna eka skandha vādaḥ eva abhipretaḥ

original: tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇāntastha eva pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraḥ sarva upapadyate /
analyzed: tasmin ca vijñāna vāde buddhi ārūḍhena rūpeṇa antasthaḥ eva pramāṇa prameya vyavahāraḥ sarvaḥ upapadyate
sati api bāhya ṛthe buddhi āroham antareṇa pramāṇa prameya phala vyavahāra anavatārāt

original: kathaṃ punaravagamyate 'ntastha evāyaṃ sarvavyavahāro na vijñānavyatirikto bāhyor'tho 'stīti /
analyzed: katham punar avagamyate eva ayam sarva vyavahāraḥ na vijñāna vyatiriktaḥ asti iti
tad asaṃbhavāt iti āha

original: sa hi bāhyortho 'bhyupagamyamānaḥ paramāṇavo vā syustatsamūhā vā stambhādayaḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: sa hi bāhyaḥ ṛthaḥ abhyupagamyamānaḥ paramāṇavaḥ vā syuḥ tad samūhāḥ vā stambha ādayaḥ syuḥ
tatra na tāvat paramāṇavaḥ stambha ādi pratyaya paricchedyāḥ bhavitum arhanti paramāṇu ābhāsa jñāna anutpatteḥ
na api tad samūhāḥ stambha ādayaḥ
teṣām paramāṇubhyaḥ nya tva ananya tvābhyām nirūpayitum aśakya tvāt
evam jāti ādīn api pratyakṣīta

original: apicānubhāvamātreṇa sādhāraṇātmano jñānasya jāyamānasya yo 'yaṃ prativiṣayaṃ pakṣapātaḥ stambhajñānaṃ kuḍyajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti,
analyzed: api ca anubhāva mātreṇa sādhāraṇa ātmanaḥ jñānasya jāyamānasya yaḥ yam prati viṣayam pakṣapātaḥ stambha jñānam kuḍya jñānam ghaṭa jñānam paṭa jñānam iti
na asau jñāna gata viśeṣam antareṇa upapadyate iti avaśyam viṣaya sārūpyam jñānasya aṅgīkartavyam
aṅgīkṛte ca tasmin viṣaya ākārasya jñānena eva avaruddha tvāt apārthikā bāhya artha sadbhāva kalpanā
api ca saha upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ viṣaya vijñānayoḥ āpatati
nahi anayoḥ ekasya anupalambhe nyasya upalambhaḥ sti
na ca etat svabhāva viveke yuktam
pratibandha kāraṇa abhāvāt
tasmāt api artha abhāvaḥ
svapna ādi vat ca idam draṣṭavyam
yathā hi svapna māyā marīci udaka gandharvanagara ādi pratyayāḥ vinā eva bāhyena arthena grāhya grāhaka ākārāḥ bhavanti
evam jāgarita gocarāḥ api stambha ādi pratyayāḥ bhavitum arhanti iti avagamyate
pratyaya tva aviśeṣāt
katham punar asati bāhya arthe pratyaya vaicitryam upapadyate
vāsanā vaicitryāt iti āha

original: anādau hi saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravadvijñānānāṃ vāsanānāṃ cānyonyanimittanaimittikabhāvena vaicitryaṃ na vipratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: anādau hi saṃsāre bīja aṅ kura vat vijñānānām vāsanānām ca anyonya nimitta naimittika bhāvena vaicitryam na vipratiṣidhyate
api ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām vāsanā nimittam eva jñāna vaicitryam iti avagamyate
svapna ādiṣu antareṇa api artham vāsanā nimittasya jñāna vaicitryasya ubhābhyām api āvābhyām abhyupagamyamāna tvāt
antareṇa tu vāsanām artha nimittasya jñāna vaicitryasya mayā an abhyupagamyamāna tvāt
tasmāt api abhāvaḥ bāhya arthasya iti
evam prāpte brūmaḥ na abhāvaḥ upalabdheḥ iti
na khalu abhāvaḥ bāhyasya arthasya adhyavasātum śakyate
kasmāt
upalabdheḥ

original: upalabhyate hi pratipratyayaṃ bāhyor'thaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
analyzed: upalabhyate hi prati pratyayam bāhyaḥ ṛthaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyam ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ iti
na ca upalabhyamānasya eva abhāvaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: yathā hi kaścidbhuñjāno bhujitasādhyāyāṃ tṛptau svayamanubhūyamānāyāmevaṃ brūyānnāhaṃ bhuñje na vā tṛpyāmīti,
analyzed: yathā hi kaścid bhuñjānaḥ bhujita sādhyāyām tṛptau svayam anubhūyamānāyām evam brūyāt na aham bhuñje na vā tṛpyāmi iti

original: tadvadindriyasaṃnikarṣeṇa svayamupalabhamāna eva bāhyamarthaṃ nāhamupalabhe naca so 'stīti bruvankathamupādeyavacanaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tadvat indriya saṃnikarṣeṇa svayam upalabhamānaḥ eva bāhyam artham na aham upalabhe na ca saḥ sti iti bruvan katham upādeya vacanaḥ syāt

original: nanu nāhamahaṃ bravīmi na kañcidarthamupalabha iti kiṃ tūpalabdhivyatiriktaṃ nopalabha iti bravīmi /
analyzed: nanu na aham aham bravīmi na kañcid artham upalabhe iti kim tu upalabdhi vyatiriktam na upalabhe iti bravīmi
bāḍham evam bravīṣi niraṅ kuśa tvāt te tuṇḍasya
na tu yakti upetam bravīṣi
yatas upalabdhi vyatirekaḥ u pi balāt arthasya abhyupagantavyaḥ upalabdheḥ eva
nahi kaścid upalabdhim eva stambhaḥ kuḍyam ca iti upalabhate

original: upalabdhiviṣayatvenaiva tu stambhakuḍyādīnsarve laukikā upalabhante yatpratyācakṣāṇā api bāhyārthameva vyācakṣate yadantarjñeyarūpaṃ tadbahirvadavabhāsata  #
analyzed: upalabdhi viṣaya tvena eva tu stambha kuḍya ādīn sarve laukikāḥ upalabhante yat pratyācakṣāṇāḥ api bāhya artham eva vyācakṣate yat antar jñeya rūpam tat bahis vat avabhāsata
iti

original: te 'pi sarvalokaprasiddhāṃ bahiravabhāsamānāṃ saṃvidaṃ pratilabhamānāḥ pratyākhyātukāmāśca bāhyamarthaṃ bahirvadati vatkāraṃ kurvanti /
analyzed: te pi sarva loka prasiddhām bahis avabhāsamānām saṃvidam pratilabhamānāḥ pratyākhyātu kāmāḥ ca bāhyam artham bahis vadati vatkāram kurvanti
itarathā hi kasmāt bahis vadati brūyuḥ
nahi viṣṇu mitraḥ vandhyā putra vat avabhāsate iti kaścid ācakṣīta

original: tasmādyathānubhavaṃ tattvamabhyupagacchadbhirbahirevāvabhāsata iti yuktamabhyupagantuṃ natu bahirvadavabhāsata iti /
analyzed: tasmāt yathānubhavam tattvam abhyupagacchadbhiḥ bahis eva avabhāsate iti yuktam abhyupagantum na tu bahis vat avabhāsate iti
nanu bāhya arthasya asaṃbhavāt bahis vat avabhāsate iti adhyavasitam

original: nāyaṃ sādhuradhyavasāyo yataḥ pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbavāsaṃbhavāvavadhāryete na punaḥ saṃbhavāsaṃbhavapūrvike pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttī
analyzed: na ayam sādhuḥ adhyavasāyaḥ yatas pramāṇa pravṛtti apravṛtti pūrvakau saṃbava asaṃbhavau avadhāryete na punar saṃbhava asaṃbhava pūrvike pramāṇa pravṛtti apravṛttī
yat hi pratyakṣa ādīnām anyatamena api pramāṇena upalabhyate tat saṃbhavati

original: yattu na kenacidapi pramāṇenopalabhyate tanna saṃbhavati /
analyzed: yat tu na kenacid api pramāṇena upalabhyate tat na saṃbhavati

original: iha tu yathāsvaṃ sarvaireva pramāṇairbāhyor'tha upalabhyamānaḥ kathaṃ vyatirekāvyatirekādivikalpairna saṃbhavatītyucyetopalabdhereva /
analyzed: iha tu yathāsvam sarvaiḥ eva pramāṇaiḥ bāhyaḥ ṛthaḥ upalabhyamānaḥ katham vyatireka avyatireka ādi vikalpaiḥ na saṃbhavati iti ucyeta upalabdheḥ eva
na ca jñānasya viṣaya sārūpyāt viṣaya nāśaḥ bhavati
asati viṣaye viṣaya sārūpya anupapatteḥ
bahis upalabdheḥ ca viṣayasya

original: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayayorupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityabyupagantavyam /
analyzed: atas eva saha upalambha niyamaḥ pi pratyaya viṣayayoḥ upāya upeya bhāva hetukaḥ na abheda hetukaḥ iti abyupagantavyam

original: apica ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti viśeṣaṇayoreva ghaṭapaṭayorbhedo na viśeṣyasya jñānasya /
analyzed: apica ghaṭa jñānam paṭa jñānam iti viśeṣaṇayoḥ eva ghaṭa paṭayoḥ bhedaḥ na viśeṣyasya jñānasya

original: dvābhyāṃ ca bheda etasya siddho bhavatyekasmācca dvayoḥ /
analyzed: dvābhyām ca bhedaḥ etasya siddhaḥ bhavati ekasmāt ca dvayoḥ
tasmāt artha jñānayoḥ bhedaḥ
tathā ghaṭa darśanam ghaṭa smaraṇam iti atra api pratipattavyam

original: atrāpi hi viśeṣyayoreva darśanasmaraṇayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇas ghaṭasya /
analyzed: atra api hi viśeṣyayoḥ eva darśana smaraṇayoḥ bhedaḥ na viśeṣaṇaḥ ghaṭasya

original: yathā kṣīragandhaḥ kṣīrarasa iti viśeṣyayoreva gandharasayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇasya kṣīrasya tadvat /
analyzed: yathā kṣīra gandhaḥ kṣīra rasaḥ iti viśeṣyayoḥ eva gandha rasayoḥ bhedaḥ na viśeṣaṇasya kṣīrasya tadvat

original: yathā raktapaṭānāṃ vijñānānavasthāne 'pi tatsaṃtānanityatā tadvaddhisicāmapītyāśaṅkyānena sūtreṇottaramucyate /

original: pradhānaṃ ca savikāraṃ puruṣārthamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃsāritvenābhimataṃ tacchūnyatāyāmīśvaraḥ kimadhitiṣṭhet /

kiṃviṣaye vā sarvajña tā īśvara te syātām
pradhāna puruṣa īśvarāṇām ca evam antavat tve satya ādimat tva prasaṅgaḥ
ādi antavat tve ca śūnyavāda prasaṅgaḥ

original: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpo 'bhyupagamyeta na pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyatteśvareṇa paricchidyata iti,
analyzed: atha mā bhūt eṣa doṣaḥ iti uttaraḥ vikalpaḥ bhyupagamyeta na pradhānasya puruṣāṇām ātmanaḥ ca iyattā īśvareṇa paricchidyate iti
tatas īśvarasya sarvajña tva abhyupagama hāniḥ aparaḥ doṣaḥ prasajyeta

original: yeṣāṃ punaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā cobhayātmakaṃ kāraṇamīśvaro 'bhimatasteṣāṃ pakṣaḥ pratyākhyāyayate /
analyzed: yeṣām punar prakṛtiḥ ca adhiṣṭhātā ca ubhaya ātmakam kāraṇam īśvaraḥ bhimataḥ teṣām pakṣaḥ

original: nanu śrutisamāśrayaṇenāpyevaṃrūpa eveśvaraḥ prāṅnirdhāritaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā ceti /

śruti anusāriṇī ca smṛtiḥ pramāṇam iti sthitiḥ
tat kasya hetoḥ eṣa pakṣaḥ pratyācikhyāsitaḥ iti
ucyate yadi api eva jātīyaka oṃśaḥ samāna tvāt na visaṃvāda gocaraḥ bhavatti astitu aṃśa antaram visaṃvāda sthānam iti atas tad pratyākhyānāya āramabhaḥ

original: tamitthaṃbhūtaṃ parameśvaraṃ bhagavantamabhigamanopādānejyāsvādhyāyayogairvarṣaśatamiṣṭvā kṣīṇakleśo bhagavantameva pratipadyata iti /

original: tatra yattāvaducyeta yo 'sau nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'vyaktātprasiddhaḥ paramātmā sarvātmā sa ātmānātmānamanekadhā vyūhyāvasthita iti,

analyzed: yasmāt na hi loke kartuḥ devadatta ādeḥ karaṇam paraśu ādi utpadyamānam dṛśyate

original: varṇayanti ca bhāgavatāḥ karturjīvātsaṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakātkaraṇaṃ manaḥ pradyumnasaṃjñakamutpadyate /
analyzed: varṇayanti ca bhāgavatāḥ kartuḥ jīvāt saṃkarṣaṇa saṃjñakāt karaṇam manaḥ pradyumna saṃjñakam utpadyate

na ca evaṃbhūtām śrutim upalabhāmahe

original: athāpi syānna caite saṃkarṣaṇādayo jīvādibhāvenābhipreyante kiṃ tarhīśvarā evaite
analyzed: atha api syāt na ca ete saṃkarṣaṇa ādayaḥ jīva ādi bhāvena abhipreyante kim tarhi īśvarāḥ eva ete

original: vāsudevā evaite sarve nirdeṣā niradhiṣṭhāna niravadyāśceti /

original: taccātmana upādhibhūtamantaḥkaraṇaṃ mano buddhirvijñānaṃ ctitamiti cānekadhā tatra tatrābhilapyate /

original: atrāha- yadi buddhivyatirikto jīvaḥ kartā syātsa svatantraḥ sanpriyaṃ hitaṃ caivātmano niyamena saṃpādayenna viparītam /

atas uttaram paṭhati

itas ca vijñāna vyatiriktaḥ jīvaḥ kartā bhavitum arhati

original: tathāca śrutirivākārānubaddhameva svapnavyāpāraṃ varṇayati- 'uteva strībhiḥ saha modamāno jakṣadutevāpi bhayāni paśyan' (bṛ. 4.3.13) iti /

original: laukikā api tathaiva svapnaṃ kathayanti- ārukṣamiva giriśṛṅgamadrākṣamiva vanarājimiti /
analyzed: laukikāḥ api tathā eva svapnam kathayanti ārukṣam iva giri śṛṅgam adrākṣam iva vana rājim iti

original: tathopādāne 'pi yadyapi karaṇeṣu karmakaraṇavibhaktinirdeśastathāpi tatsaṃpṛktasyaivātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ draṣṭavyam /

kevale kartṛ tva asaṃbhavasya darśita tvāt

original: bhavati ca loke 'nekaprakārā vivakṣā yodhā yudhyante yodhai rājā yudhyata iti /

original: apicāsminnupādāne karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraṃ vivakṣyate na svātantryaṃ kasyacidabuddhipūrvakasyāpi svāpe karaṇavyāpāroparamasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: api ca asmin upādāne karaṇa vyāpāra uparama mātram vivakṣyate na svātantryam kasyacid abuddhi pūrvakasya api svāpe karaṇa vyāpāra uparamasya dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: yastvayaṃ vyapadeśo darśitaḥ 'vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute' iti,

śraddhā ādīnām ca buddhi dharma tva prasiddheḥ
vijñānam devāḥ sarve brahma jyeṣṭham upāsate taiḥ
iti ca vākya śeṣāt
jyeṣṭha tvasya ca prathama ja tvam asya buddhau prasiddha tvāt

original: 'sa eṣa vācaścittasyottarottarakramo yadyajñaḥ' iti ca śrutyantare yajñasya vāgbuddhisādhyatvāvadhāramāt /

original: naca loke prasiddhirasti kṛṣyādikāsu kriyāsvanaḍudādivadīśvaro 'paro 'pekṣitavya iti /

original: kleṣātmakena ca kartṛtvena jantūnsaṃsṛjata īśvarasya nairghṛṇyaṃ prasajyeta,

nanu vaiṣamya nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣa tvāt iti uktam

avidyā avasthāyām kārya karaṇa saṃghāta aviveka darśinaḥ jīvasya avidyā timira andhasya sataḥ

original: yadyapi ca loke kṛṣyādiṣu karmasu neśvarakāraṇatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ,
analyzed: yadi api ca loke kṛṣi ādiṣu karmasu na īśvara kāraṇa tvam prasiddham
tathā api sarvāsu eva pravṛttiṣu īśvaraḥ hetu kartā iti śruteḥ avasīyate

original: tathāhi śrutirbhavati- 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīyate /
analyzed: tathā hi śrutiḥ bhavati eṣa hi eva sādhu karma kārayati tam yam ebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ unninīyate

original: eṣa hyevāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' (kauṣī. 3.8) iti /
analyzed: eṣa hi eva asādhu karma kārayati tam yam adhas ninīṣate iti
yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati iti ca evañjātīyakā

original: nanvevamīśvarasya kārayitṛtve sati vaiṣamyanairghaṇye syātāmakṛtābhyāgamaśca jīvasyeti /
analyzed: nanu evam īśvarasya kārayitṛ tve sati vaiṣamya nairghaṇye syātām akṛta abhyāgamaḥ ca jīvasya iti
na iti ucyate
kṛta prayatna apekṣaḥ tu vihita pratiṣiddha a vaiyarthya ādibhyaḥ
tuśabdaḥ codita doṣa vyāvartana arthaḥ

original: kṛto yaḥ prayatno jīvasya dharmādharmalakṣaṇastadapekṣa evainamīśvaraḥ kārayati /
analyzed: kṛtaḥ yaḥ prayatnaḥ jīvasya dharma adharma lakṣaṇaḥ tad apekṣaḥ eva enam īśvaraḥ kārayati
tatas ca ete coditāḥ doṣāḥ na prasajyante

original: jīvakṛtadharmādharmavaiṣamyāpekṣa eva tattatphalāni viṣamaṃ vibhajetparjanyavadīśvaro nimittatvamātreṇa /
analyzed: jīva kṛta dharma adharma vaiṣamya apekṣaḥ eva tad tad phalāni viṣamam vibhajet parjanya vat īśvaraḥ nimitta tva mātreṇa

original: yathā loke nānāvidhānāṃ gucchagulmādīnāṃ vrīhiyavādīnāṃ cāsādhāraṇebhyaḥ svasvabījebhyo jāyamānānāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati parjanyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā loke nānāvidhānām guccha gulma ādīnām vrīhi yava ādīnām ca a sādhāraṇebhyaḥ sva sva bījebhyaḥ jāyamānānām sādhāraṇam nimittam bhavati parjanyaḥ
na hi asati parjanye rasa paṣpa palāśa ādi vaiṣamyam teṣām jāyate
na api asatsu sva sva bījeṣu

original: evaṃ jīvakṛtaprayatnāpekṣa īśvarasteṣāṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vidadhyāditi śliṣyate /

original: nanu kṛtaprayatnāpekṣatvameva jīvasya parāyatte kartṛtve nopapadyate /

na eṣa doṣaḥ
parāyatte pi hi kartṛ tve karoti eva jīvaḥ
kurvantam hi tam īśvaraḥ kārayati

original: apica pūrvaprayatnamapekṣyedānīṃ kārayati pūrvataraṃ ca prayatnamapekṣya pūrvamakārayadityanāditvātsaṃsārasyetyanavadyam /

vihita pratiṣiddha a vaiyarthya ādibhyaḥ iti āha

iti evañjātīyakasya vihitasya pratiṣiddhasya ca a vaiyarthyam bhavati

īśvaraḥ eva vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ niyujyeta
atyanta paratantra tvāt jīvasya

original: īśvarasya cātyantānapekṣatve laukikasyāpi puruṣakārasya vaiyarthyaṃ tathā deśakālanimittānāṃ pūrvoktadoṣaprasaṅgaścetyevañjātīyakaṃ doṣajātamādigrahaṇena  #

original: sa ca saṃbaddhayoreva loke dṛṣṭo yathā svāmibhṛtyayoryathā vāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ /

prāpnoti

original: athavā svāmibhṛtyaprakāreṣveveśitrīśitavyabhāvasya prasiddhatvāttadvidha eva saṃbandha iti prāpnoti /

atas bravīti aṃśaḥ iti

original: aṃśa ivāṃśo nahi niravayavasya mukhyoṃ'śaḥ saṃbhavati /

original: 'etameva viditvā munirbhavati' ' ya ātmani tiṣṭhannātmānamantaro yamayati' iti caivañjātīyako bhedanirdeśo nāsati bhede yujyate /

original: nanu cāyaṃ nānāvyapadeśaḥ sutarāṃ svāmibhṛtyasārūpye yujyata ityata āha- anyathā cāpīti /

original: kiṃ tarhyanyathā cāpi vyapadeśo bhavatyanānātvasya pratipādakaḥ /

original: tathāhi- eke śākhino dāśakitavādibhāvaṃ brahmaṇa āmanantyātharvaṇikā brahmasūkte- 'brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahmaiveme kitavāḥ' ityādinā /

dāśāḥ ye ete kaivartāḥ prasiddhāḥ
ye ca amī dāsāḥ svāmiṣu ātmānam upakṣapayanti

original: ye cānye kitavā dyūtakṛtaste sarve brahmaiveti hīnajantūdāharaṇena sarveṣāmeva nāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapraviṣṭānāṃ jīvānāṃ brahmatvamāha
analyzed: ye ca anye kitavāḥ dyūta kṛtaḥ te sarve brahmā eva iti hīna jantu udāharaṇena sarveṣām eva nāma rūpa kṛta kārya karaṇa saṃghāta praviṣṭānām jīvānām brahmatvam āha

original: tathānyatrāpi brahmaprakriyāyāmevāyamarthaḥ prapañcyate- 'tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumānasi tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī /
analyzed: tathā anyatra api brahma prakriyāyām eva ayam arthaḥ prapañcyate tvam strī tvam pumān asi tvam kumāraḥ uta vā kumārī

original: tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ' (śve. 4.3) iti /
analyzed: tvam jīrṇaḥ daṇḍena vañcasi tvam jātaḥ bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ śve iti

original: 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' iti ca /
analyzed: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīraḥ nāmāni kṛtvā abhivadanyat āste iti ca
na anyaḥ taḥ sti draṣṭā bṛca
ityādi śrutibhyaḥ ca asya arthasya siddhiḥ

atas bheda abheda avagamābhyām aṃśa tva avagamaḥ
kutas ca aṃśa tva avagamaḥ
mantra varṇāt ca
mantra varṇaḥ ca etam artham avagamayati tāvān asya mahimā tatas jyāyān ca puruṣaḥ
pādaḥ sya sarvābhūtāni tri pādasya amṛtam divi chā iti
atra bhūta śabdena jīva pradhānāni sthāvara jaṅgamāni nirdiśati
a hiṃsan sarva bhūtāni anyatra tīrthebhyaḥ iti prayogāt
aṃśaḥ pādaḥ bhāgaḥ iti anarthāntaram
tasmāt api aṃśa tva avagamaḥ
kutas ca aṃśa tva avagamaḥ
api ca smaryate  /

original: īśvaragītāsvapi ceśvaraṃśatvaṃ jīvasya smaryate- 'mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ' (15.7) iti /
analyzed: īśvaragītāsu api ca īśvara aṃśa tvam jīvasya smaryate mama eva aṃśaḥ jīva loke jīva bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ iti
tasmāt api aṃśa tva avagamaḥ
yat tu uktam svāmi bhṛtya ādiṣu eva īśitṛ īśitavya bhāvaḥ loke prasiddhaḥ iti
yadi api eṣā loke prasiddhaḥ tathā api śāstrāt tu atra aṃśa aṃśi tvam īśitṛ īśitavya bhāvaḥ ca niścīyate
niratiśaya upādhi saṃpannaḥ ca īśvaraḥ nihīna upādhi saṃpannān jīvān praśāsti iti na kiñcid vipratiṣidhyate  /

original: atrāha- nanu jīvasyeśvarāṃśatvābhyupagame tadīyena saṃsāraduḥkhopabhogenāṃśina īśvarasyāpi duḥkhitvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: atra āha nanu jīvasya īśvara aṃśa tva abhyupagame tadīyena saṃsāra duḥkha upabhogena aṃśinaḥ īśvarasya api duḥkhi tvam syāt

original: yathā loke hastapādādyanyatamāṅgagatena duḥkhenāṅgino devadattasya duḥkhitvaṃ tadvat /
analyzed: yathā loke hasta pāda ādi anyatama aṅga gatena duḥkhena aṅginaḥ devadattasya duḥkhi tvam tadvat
tatas ca tad prāptānām mahattaram duḥkham prāpnuyāt

original: ato varaṃ pūrvāvasthaḥ saṃsāra evāstviti samyagdarśanānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi /
analyzed: atas varam pūrva avasthaḥ saṃsāraḥ evā astu iti samyak darśana ānarthakya prasaṅgaḥ syāt iti
atrā ucyate
prakāśa ādi vat na evam paraḥ

original: yathā jīvaḥ saṃsāraduḥkhamanubhavati naivaṃ para īśvaro 'nubhavatīti pratijānīmahe /
analyzed: yathā jīvaḥ saṃsāra duḥkham anubhavati na evam paraḥ īśvaraḥ nubhavati iti pratijānīmahe

original: jīvo hyavidyāveśavaśāddehādyātmabhāvamiva gatvā tatkṛtena duḥkhena duḥkhyahamityavidyayā kṛtaṃ duḥkhopabhogamabhimanyate /
analyzed: jīvaḥ hi avidyā āveśa vaśāt deha ādi ātma bhāvam iva gatvā tad kṛtena duḥkhena duḥkhī aham iti avidyayā kṛtam duḥkha upabhogam abhimanyate
na evam parameśvarasya deha ādi ātma bhāvaḥ duḥkha abhimānaḥ vā asti
jīvasya api avidyā kṛta nāma rūpa nirvṛtta deha indriya ādi upādhya viveka bhrama nimittaḥ eva duḥkha abhimānaḥ na tu pāramārthikaḥ sti
yathā ca sva deha gata dāha cheda ādi nimittam duḥkham tad abhimāna bhrāntyā anubhavati tathā
putra mitra ādi gocaram api duḥkham tad abhimāna bhrāntyā eva anubhavati aham eva putraḥ ham eva
mitram iti evam sneha vaśena putra mitra ādiṣu abhiniviśamānaḥ

original: tataśca niścitametadavagamyate- mithyābhimānabhramanimitta eva duḥkhānubhava iti /

original: tathāhi- putramitrādimatsu bahuṣūpaviṣṭeṣu tatsaṃbandhābhimāniṣvitareṣu ca putro

original: śarīramapi sarvātmasaṃnidhāvutpadyamānamasyaivātmano netareṣāmiti na niyantuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: śarīram api sarva ātma saṃnidhau utpadyamānam asya eva ātmanaḥ na itareṣām iti na niyantum śakyam

original: pradeśaviśeṣābhyupagame 'pi ca dvayorātmanoḥ samānasukhaduḥkhabhājoḥ kadācidekenaiva tāvaccharīreṇopabhogasiddhiḥ syāt /
analyzed: pradeśa viśeṣa abhyupagame ca dvayoḥ ātmanoḥ samāna sukha duḥkha bhājoḥ kadācid ekena eva tāvat śarīreṇa upabhoga siddhiḥ syāt
samāna pradeśasya api dvayoḥ ātmanoḥ adṛṣṭasya saṃbhavāt
tathā hi devadattaḥ yasmin pradeśe sukha duḥkham anvabhūt tasmāt pradeśāt apakrānte tad śarīre

original: yajñadattaśarīre ca taṃ pradeśamanuprāpte tasyāpītareṇa samānaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubhavo
analyzed: yajñadatta śarīre ca tam pradeśam anuprāpte tasya api itareṇa samānaḥ sukha duḥkha anubhavaḥ

original: dṛśyate sa na syādyadi devadattayajñadattayoḥ samānapradeśamaniṣṭaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: dṛśyate sa na syāt yadi devadatta yajñadattayoḥ samāna pradeśam aniṣṭam na syāt
svarga ādi anupabhoga prasaṅgaḥ ca pradeśavādinaḥ syāt
brāhmaṇa ādi śarīra pradeśeṣu adṛṣṭa niṣpatteḥ pradeśa antara varti tvāt ca svārga ādi upabhogasya
sarvagata tva anupapattiḥ ca bahūnām ātmanām
dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt
vada tāvat tvam ke bahavaḥ samāna pradeśāḥ ca iti
rūpa ādayaḥ iti ced na
teṣām api dharmi aṃśena abhedāt lakṣaṇa bhedāt ca
na tu bahūnām ātmanām lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ sti
antya viśeṣa vaśāt bheda upapattiḥ iti ced na

ākāśa ādīnām api vibhu tvam brahma vādinaḥ siddham kāryatva abhyupagamāt
tasmāt ātma ekatva pakṣe eva sarva doṣa abhāvaḥ iti siddham  /

original: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śrīśārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //

dvitīya adhyāye caturthaḥ pādaḥ
atra pāde liṅga śarīra śrutīnām virodha parihāraḥ

tathā prāṇāḥ

iti tasmāt vai etasmāt ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ taitti

original: iti caivamādiṣūtpattiprakaraṇeṣu prāṇānāmutpajirnāmnāyate kvaciccānutpattirevaiṣāmāmnāyate 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' (tai. 2.7)
analyzed: iti ca evamādiṣu utpatti prakaraṇeṣu prāṇānām utpajiḥ na āmnāyate kvacid ca anutpattiḥ eva eṣām āmnāyate asat vai idam agre āsīt taiḥ
tat āhuḥ kim tat asat āsīt iti ṛṣayaḥ vāva te gre sadā āsīt
tat āhuḥ ke te ṛṣayaḥ iti

original: prāṇā vāva ṛṣayaḥ' ityatra prāgutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvaśravaṇāt /
analyzed: prāṇāḥ vāva ṛṣayaḥ iti atra prāk utpatteḥ prāṇānām sadbhāva śravaṇāt

original: anyatra tu prāṇānāmapyutpattiḥ paṭhyate- 'yathāgnerjvalataḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccarantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' iti,
analyzed: anyatra tu prāṇānām api utpattiḥ paṭhyate yathā agneḥ jvalataḥ kṣudrāḥ visphuliṅgāḥ vyuccaranti evam eva etasmāt ātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ iti
etasmāt jāyate prāṇaḥ manaḥ sarva indriyāṇi ca muṇḍa
iti sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt mu

original: iti, 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano 'nnam' (pra. 6.4)
analyzed: iti sa prāṇam asṛjata prāṇāt śraddhām kham vāyuḥ jyotiḥ āpaḥ pṛthivī indriyam manaḥ nnam pra
iti ca evamādi pradeśeṣu
tatra tatra śruti vipratiṣedhāt anyatara nirdhāraṇa kāraṇa anirūpaṇāt ca apratipattiḥ prāpnoti
athavā prāk utpatteḥ sadbhāva śravaṇāt gauṇī prāṇānām utpattiḥ iti prāpnoti
atas uttaram idam paṭhati tathā prāṇāḥ iti
katham punar atra tathā iti akṣara ānulomyam prakṛta upamāna abhāvāt
sarvagata ātma bahu tva vādi dūṣaṇam atīta anantara pādānte prakṛtam tat tāvat na upamānam saṃbhavati sādṛśya abhāvāt
sādṛśye hi sati upamānam syāt
yathā siṃhaḥ tathā balavarmā iti
adṛṣṭa sāmya pratipādana artham iti yadi ucyeta
yathā adṛṣṭasya sarva ātma saṃnidhau utpadyamānasya aniyata tvam evam prāṇānām api sarva ātmanaḥ prati aniyata tvam iti
tat api deha aniyamena eva ukta tvāt punar uktam bhavet
na ca jīvena prāṇāḥ upamīyeran siddhānta virodhāt

prāṇānām tu utpattiḥ vyācikhyāsitā

udāharaṇa upāttena api upamānena saṃbandha upapatteḥ

original: atra prāṇotpattivādivākyajātamujadāharaṇam- 'etasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' (bṛ. 2.1.20)
analyzed: atra prāṇa utpatti vādi vākya jāta mujat āharaṇam etasmāt ātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti bṛ
iti evañjātīyakam

original: tatra yathā lokādayaḥ parasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyante tathā prāṇā apītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yathā loka ādayaḥ parasmāt brahmaṇaḥ utpadyante tathā prāṇāḥ api iti arthaḥ

original: tathā- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3)
analyzed: tathā etasmāt jāyate prāṇaḥ manaḥ sarva indriyāṇi ca kham vāyuḥ jyotiḥ āpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī muṇḍa
iti evamādiṣu api kha ādi vat prāṇānām utpattiḥ iti draṣṭavyam

original: yathātītānantarapādādyuktā viyadādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇo vikārāḥ samadhigatāstathā prāṇā api parasya brahmaṇo vikārā iti yojayitavyam /
analyzed: yathā atīta anantara pāda ādi uktāḥ viyat ādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇaḥ vikārāḥ samadhigatāḥ tathā prāṇāḥ api parasya brahmaṇaḥ vikārāḥ iti yojayitavyam

original: nanu keṣucitpradeśeṣu na prāṇānāmutpattiḥ śrūyata ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /

ānulomyam āñjasyam

original: yathā tṛtīyādhyaye caturthapādeṣvapratigraheṣvadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyo bahusūtravyavahito 'pi somavamane parāmṛśyate tadvadatrāpi jñeyam /

gauṇyāḥ asaṃbhavaḥ gauṇī asaṃbhavaḥ
nahi prāṇānām utpatti śrutiḥ gauṇī saṃbhavati
pratijñā hāni prasaṅgāt

original: iti hyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya tatsādhanāyedamāmnāyate- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3) ityādi /

original: sā ca pratijñā prāṇādeḥ samastasya jāgato brahmavikāratve sati prakṛtivyatirekeṇa vikārābhāvātsiddhyati /

katham punar prāk utpatteḥ prāṇānām sadbhāva śravaṇam

original: avāntaraprakṛtiviṣayaṃ tvetatsvavavikārāpekṣaṃ pragutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvāvadhāraṇamiti draṣṭavyam /

itas ca ākāśa ādīnām iva prāṇānām api mukhyā eva janma śrutiḥ

original: tathāpi brahmaprakṛtikatejobannapīrvakatvābhidhānādvākprāṇamanasāṃ tatsāmānyācca sarveṣāmeva prāṇānāṃ brahmaprabhavatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /

original: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'atha yatraitadākāśamanuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya takṣuratha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam'  #

iti
trivṛtkṛtā bhūmiḥ eva eṣā vrīhi yava ādi anna rūpeṇa adyate iti abhiprāyaḥ
tasyāḥ ca sthaviṣṭham rūpam purīṣa bhāvena bahis nirgacchati
madhyamam adhyātmam māṃsam vardhayati
aṇiṣṭham tu manaḥ
evam itarayoḥ ap tejasoḥ yathāśabdam kāryam avagantavyam
evam mūtram lohitam prāṇaḥ ca apām kāryam
asthi majjā vāc tejasaḥ iti

original: atrāha- yadi sarvameva trivṛtkṛtaṃ bhūtabhautikamaviśeṣaśruteḥ 'tāsa trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāmakarot' iti /
analyzed: atra āha yadi sarvam eva trivṛt kṛtam bhūta bhautikam aviśeṣa śruteḥ tāsā trivṛtam trivṛtam ekaikām akarot iti

original: kiṅkṛtastarhyayaṃ viśeṣavyapadeśaḥ 'idaṃ teja imā āpa idamannam' iti /
analyzed: kiṅkṛtaḥ tarhi ayam viśeṣa vyapadeśaḥ idam tejaḥ imāḥ āpaḥ idam annam iti
tathā adhyātmam idam annasya aśitasya kāryam māṃsa ādi
idam apām pītānām kāryam lohita ādi
idam kāryam asthi ādi iti
atrā ucyate
vaiśeṣyāt tu tad vādaḥ tad vādaḥ
tuśabdena ca uditam doṣam apanudati
viśeṣasya bhāvaḥ vaiśeṣyam
bhūyaḥ tvam iti yāvat
sati api trivṛtkaraṇe kvacid kasyacid bhūta dhātoḥ bhūyaḥ tvam upalabhyate agneḥ tejaḥ bhūyaḥ tvam udakasya ap bhūyaḥ tvam pṛthivyāḥ anna bhūyaḥ tvam iti
vyavahāra prasiddhi artham ca idam trivṛtkaraṇam

original: vyavahāraśca trivṛtkṛtarajjuvadekatvāpattau satyāṃ na bhedena bhūtatrayagocaro lokasya prasiddhyet /
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ ca trivṛtkṛta rajju vat eka tva āpattau satyām na bhedena bhūta traya gocaraḥ lokasya prasiddhyet

original: tasmātsatyapi trivṛtkaraṇe vaiśeṣyādeva tejobannaviśeṣavādo bhūtabhautikaviṣaya upapadyate /
analyzed: tasmāt sati api trivṛtkaraṇe vaiśeṣyāt eva tejaḥ banna viśeṣa vādaḥ bhūta bhautika viṣayaḥ upapadyate
tad vādaḥ tad vādaḥ iti pada abhyāsaḥ dhyāya parisamāptim dyotayati
iti śrīmat paramahaṃsa parivrājaka ācārya śrīmat śaṅkara bhagavat pūjya pāda kṛtau śārīraka mīmāṃsā bhāṣye dvitīya adhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ  /
iti śrīmat brahmasūtra śāṅkara bhāṣye virodha ākhyaḥ dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
